## <a name="authentication-events"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-165">Događaji potvrde identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-165">Authentication events</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-166">Ovi događaji dijagnostičkih podataka se prikupljaju kada Office pokuša da preuzme token potvrde identiteta, ili tiho ili putem upita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-166">These diagnostic data events are collected when Office attempts to acquire an authentication token, either silently or through prompting.</span></span>

### <a name="officeidentityfbapromptwin32"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-167">Office.Identity.FbaPromptWin32</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-167">Office.Identity.FbaPromptWin32</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-168">Prikuplja se kada Office prikaže korisniku Forms-Based-Auth upit za prijavljivanje zasnovan na formularu za potvrdu identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-168">Collected when Office shows the user a Forms-Based-Auth sign-in prompt.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-169">Pored tihog preuzimanja tokena, upit za potvrdu identiteta se koristi da se odredi da li se korisnik nalazi u statusu neispravne potvrde identiteta, što bi za korisnika značilo da je stanje klijenta van mreže, a u najgorem slučaju, neispravna potvrda identiteta može sprečiti preuzimanje licence i dovesti do potpuno neupotrebljivog klijenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-169">Along with silent token acquisitions, authentication prompts is used to determine if user is in a broken authentication state which, for the user, results in what is essentially an Offline Client state, or in the worst case, broken authentication may prevent license acquisition and result in a completely unusable client.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-170">Upiti za prijavljivanje zasnovani na formularu za potvrdu identiteta (FBA - Forms-Based-Auth) se koriste u nekim scenarijima za lokalnu potvrdu identiteta i uglavnom se trudimo da se to ne dešava jer bi svi trebalo da koriste modernu identifikaciju (modern-Auth) zbog bezbednosnih ranjivosti koje se odnose na FBA.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-170">Forms-Based-Auth (FBA) sign-in prompts are used for some on-premises authentication scenarios and typically we want to make sure this isn’t happening, as everyone should be using Modern-Auth because of security vulnerabilities associated with FBA.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-171">**Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-171">**The following fields are collected:**</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-172">**AuthScheme** - šema koja se koristi za potvrdu identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-172">**AuthScheme** - the authentication scheme used</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-173">**DocumentUrlHash** - šifrovani URL zahtevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-173">**DocumentUrlHash** - an encrypted URL requesting</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-174">**EndTag** - oznaka gde je završen FBA obrazac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-174">**EndTag** - the tag where FBA form is completed</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-175">**Flags** - zastarelo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-175">**Flags** - Obsolete</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-176">**EndTag** - oznaka gde počinje FBA obrazac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-176">**FlowTag** - the tag where FBA form is started</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-177">**LastError** - vraćanje koda greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-177">**LastError** – the error code returned</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-178">**PromptEndTime** - vreme kada je upit završen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-178">**PromptEndTime** - the time when then prompt ended</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-179">**PromptStartTime** - vreme kada je upit započet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-179">**PromptStartTime** - the time when the prompt started</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-180">**Rezultat** - da li je potvrda identiteta uspela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-180">**Result** - whether the authentication succeeded</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-181">**SessionEndTime** - vreme kada je sesija događaja završena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-181">**SessionEndTime** – the time when the event session ended</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-182">**Timeout** - vreme kada je upit istekao</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-182">**Timeout** - the time when the prompt timed out</span></span>

### <a name="officeidentitysignoutevent"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-183">Office.Identity.SignOutEvent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-183">Office.Identity.SignOutEvent</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-184">Prikuplja se kada se korisnik odjavi sa sistema Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-184">Collected when a user signs out of Office.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-185">Saznanje da se korisnik odjavio omogućava klasifikaciju ostalih događaja, kao što su upiti, na način na koji se očekuje kako bi se pravilno izračunala njihova pouzdanost / metrička spremnost otpreme i da bi se izbeglo upozorenje i vraćanje na prethodne verzije zasnovano na lažnoj premisi da korisnik ima neočekivane probleme sa upitima za potvrdu identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-185">Knowing the user is signed-out makes it possible to classify other events, such as prompts, as expected, so those events can be correctly computed in reliability / ship-readiness metrics and avoid alerting or rolling back builds on the faulty premise that the user is experiencing unexpected sign-in prompts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-186">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-186">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-187">**FlowEndTime** - vreme kada je aktivnost odjave završena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-187">**FlowEndTime** - the time when the sign out action ended</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-188">**FlowEndTime** - vreme kada je aktivnost odjave započeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-188">**FlowStartTime** - the time when the sign out action started</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-189">**IdentityErrorState** - bilo koji status greške identiteta prilikom odjave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-189">**IdentityErrorState** - any identity error state during sign out</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-190">**IdentityHashedUniqueId** - odjava šifrovanog ID identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-190">**IdentityHashedUniqueId** - the encrypted identity ID being signed out</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-191">**IdentityProviderType** - odjava dobavljača identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-191">**IdentityProviderType** - the identity provider of the identity being signed out</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-192">**IdentityUniqueID** - odjava ID identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-192">**IdentityUniqueID** - the identity ID being signed out</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-193">**SessionEndTime** - vreme kada je sesija događaja završena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-193">**SessionEndTime** - the time when the event session ended</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-194">**SignOutUserAction** - ukazuje na to da je korisnik započeo radnju odjavljivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-194">**SignOutUserAction** - Indicates the user initiates the sign out action</span></span>

### <a name="officeidentitysspipromptwin32"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-195">Office.Identity.SspiPromptWin32</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-195">Office.Identity.SspiPromptWin32</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-196">Prikuplja se kada Office prikaže korisniku Windows SSPI upit za prijavljivanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-196">Collected when Office shows the user a Windows SSPI sign-in prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-197">Pored tihog preuzimanja tokena, upiti za potvrdu identiteta određuju da li se korisnik nalazi u statusu neispravne potvrde identiteta, što bi značilo da je stanje klijenta van mreže.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-197">Along with silent token acquisitions, authentication prompts determine whether a user is in a broken authentication state, which results in an Offline Client state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-198">Neispravna potvrda identiteta može sprečiti preuzimanje licence i dovesti do potpuno neupotrebljivog klijenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-198">Broken authentication may prevent license acquisition and result in a completely unusable client.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-199">Windows SSPI upiti se koriste za potvrdu identiteta sa sistemom Exchange (za sinhronizaciju e-pošte) kada korisnikovi Exchange resursi nisu podešeni za višestruke potvrde identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-199">Windows SSPI prompts are used for authenticating with Exchange (for mail synchronizing) when the user's Exchange resource hasn't been setup for multi-factor authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-200">Ovi događaji, zajedno sa događajima prostora Office.MATS, koriste se za sledeće svrhe:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-200">These events, along with the Office.MATS namespace events, are used for the following purposes:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-201">1\) Utvrđivanje da li klijent može uspešno da pribavi token potvrde identiteta ili se nalazi u neispravnom stanju potvrde identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-201">1\) Identify whether clients can successfully obtain an authentication token or have entered a broken authentication state.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-202">2\) Procenjivanje da li su promene koje su se desile u klijentu ili uslugama dovele do kritičnih regresija u korisničkom iskustvu potvrde identiteta i pouzdanosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-202">2\) Evaluate whether changes that have occurred on the client or services have resulted in critical regressions in the user's authentication experience and reliability</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-203">3\) Kada dođe do greške, ovi signali emituju bitne kodove grešaka odgovornih komponenata (kôd Office klijenta, biblioteke potvrde identiteta, upravne usluge) i mogu se koristiti za trijažu, dijagnozu i ublažavanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-203">3\) When failures occur, these signals emit important failure codes from the responsible component (Office client code, authentication libraries, or authority services) which can be used for triage, diagnosis and mitigation</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-204">4\) Ovi signali napajaju razne spremnosti otpreme i nadgledanja ispravnosti koja šalju upozorenja da bi naši inženjeri mogli brzo da odreaguju i da smanje vreme ublažavanja kritičnih grešaka koje blokiraju korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-204">4\) These signals power various ship readiness and health monitors which fire alerts so our engineers can engage quickly and reduce the time to mitigation of critical user-blocking failures</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-205">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-205">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-206">**AllowSavedCreds** - da li je novi akreditiv stalan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-206">**AllowSavedCreds** - whether the new credential is persisted</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-207">**AuthScheme** - šema koja se koristi za potvrdu identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-207">**AuthScheme** - the authentication scheme used</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-208">**CredsSaved** - da li je novi akreditiv sačuvan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-208">**CredsSaved** - whether the new credential is saved</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-209">**DocumentUrlHash** - šifrovani URL zahtevi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-209">**DocumentUrlHash** - the encrypted URL requesting</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-210">**EndTag** - oznaka gde je upit završen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-210">**EndTag** - the tag where the prompt ended</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-211">**NewIdentity**\_ErrorState – da li je novi identitet važeći</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-211">**NewIdentity**\_ErrorState – whether the new identity is valid</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-212">**NewIdentity\_HashedUniqueId** - novi šifrovani ID identiteta kada se upit završi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-212">**NewIdentity\_HashedUniqueId** - the encrypted new identity ID after prompt is completed</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-213">**NewIdentity\_ProviderType** - novi dobavljač identiteta kada se upit završi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-213">**NewIdentity\_ProviderType** - the new identity provider after the prompt is completed</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-214">**NewIdentity\_HashedUniqueId** - novi šifrovani ID kada se upit završi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-214">**NewIdentity\_UniqueID** - the new identity ID after the prompt is completed</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-215">**OutStatus** – da li je izlaz upita važeći</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-215">**OutStatus** - whether the prompt output is valid</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-216">**PromptEndTime** - vreme kada je upit završen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-216">**PromptEndTime** - the time when the prompt ended</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-217">**PromptFailedTag** - oznaka koja označava neuspešnost SSPI upita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-217">**PromptFailedTag** - the tag that indicates SSPI prompt failure</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-218">**PromptFlow** - oznaka koja poziva SSPI upit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-218">**PromptFlow** - the tag that invoked the SSPI prompt</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-219">**PromptStartTime** - vreme kada je upit započet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-219">**PromptStartTime** - the time when the prompt started</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-220">**Proxy** - ako se koristi proxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-220">**Proxy** - if proxy is used</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-221">**ServerHash** - šifrovana adresa servera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-221">**ServerHash** - the encrypted server address</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-222">**SessionEndTime** - vreme kada je sesija događaja završena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-222">**SessionEndTime** - the time when the event session ended</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-223">**Timeout** - vreme kada je upit istekao</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-223">**Timeout** - the time when the prompt is timed out</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-224">**UiMessage** - poruka korisničkog interfejsa u upitu </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-224">**UiMessage** - the UI message in the prompt</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-225">**UserNameHash** - šifrovano korisničko ime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-225">**UserNameHash** - the encrypted user name</span></span>

### <a name="officeidentitywin32prompt"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-226">Office.Identity.Win32Prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-226">Office.Identity.Win32Prompt</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-227">Prikuplja se kada Office prikaže korisniku upit za prijavljivanje za višestruku potvrdu identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-227">Collected when Office shows the user a multi-factor authentication sign-in prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-228">Pored tihog preuzimanja tokena, upiti za potvrdu identiteta određuju da li se korisnik nalazi u statusu neispravne potvrde identiteta, što bi značilo da je stanje klijenta van mreže.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-228">Along with silent token acquisitions, authentication prompts determine whether a user is in a broken authentication state, which results in an Offline Client state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-229">Neispravna potvrda identiteta može sprečiti preuzimanje licence i dovesti do potpuno neupotrebljivog klijenta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-229">Broken authentication may prevent license acquisition and result in a completely unusable client.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-230">Ovi događaji, zajedno sa događajima prostora Office.MATS, koriste se za sledeće svrhe:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-230">These events, along with the Office.MATS namespace events, are used for the following purposes:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-231">1\) Utvrđivanje da li klijent može uspešno da pribavi token potvrde identiteta ili se nalazi u neispravnom stanju potvrde identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-231">1\) Identify whether clients can successfully obtain an authentication token or have entered in to a broken authentication state.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-232">2\) Procenjivanje da li su promene koje su se desile u klijentu ili uslugama dovele do kritičnih regresija u korisničkom iskustvu potvrde identiteta i pouzdanosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-232">2\) Evaluate whether changes that have occurred on the client or services have resulted in critical regressions in the user's authentication experience and reliability</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-233">3\) Kada dođe do greške, ovi signali emituju bitne kodove grešaka odgovornih komponenata (kôd Office klijenta, biblioteke potvrde identiteta, upravne usluge) i mogu se koristiti za trijažu, dijagnozu i ublažavanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-233">3\) When failures occur, these signals emit important failure codes from the responsible component (Office client code, authentication libraries, or authority services) which can be used for triage, diagnosis and mitigation</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-234">4\) Ovi signali napajaju razne spremnosti otpreme i nadgledanja ispravnosti koja šalju upozorenja da bi naši inženjeri mogli brzo da odreaguju i da smanje vreme ublažavanja kritičnih grešaka koje blokiraju korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-234">4\) These signals power various ship readiness and health monitors which fire alerts so our engineers can engage quickly and reduce the time to mitigation of critical user-blocking failures.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-235">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-235">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-236">**AdalWAMUsed** - oznaka koja ukazuje na rezultat ako se koristi ADAL-atop-WAM</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-236">**AdalWAMUsed** – the tag that indicates result if ADAL-atop-WAM is used</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-237">**CallTag** - oznaka koja ukazuje na poziv korisničkog interfejsa za prijavljivanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-237">**CallTag** – the tag that indicates the caller of sign in UI</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-238">**Context** - kontekst za upita za prijavljivanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-238">**Context** - the sign in context for the prompt</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-239">**EndTagIdentityProviderRequested** - oznaka gde je zatražen dobavljač identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-239">**EndTagIdentityProviderRequested** - the tag where the identity provider is requested</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-240">**HrdShownTag** - oznaka gde se prikazuje HDR dijalog za prijavljivanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-240">**HrdShownTag** - the tag where the HRD sign in dialog is shown</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-241">**IdentityProviderResulted** - tip dobavljača identiteta koji se zahteva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-241">**IdentityProviderResulted** - the identity provider type it is requesting</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-242">**IdPFlowTag** - oznaka koja ukazuje na rezultat zahteva identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-242">**IdPFlowTag** - the tag that indicates the identity request result</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-243">**LastLoginDelta** - vreme proteklo od poslednjeg uspešnog prijavljivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-243">**LastLoginDelta** - the time delta from last successful login</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-244">**NewIdentity\_** ErrorState – da li je novi identitet važeći nakon završenog upita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-244">**NewIdentity\_ErrorState** - whether the identity is valid after prompt</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-245">**NewIdentity\_ProviderType** - novi tip dobavljača identiteta nakon završenog upita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-245">**NewIdentity\_ProviderType** - the new identity provider type after prompt</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-246">**NewIdentity\_HashedUniqueId** - novi dobijeni ID identiteta nakon završenog upita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-246">**NewIdentity\_UniqueID** - the new identity ID returned after prompt</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-247">**PromptCorrelation** - Upit ID korelacije za dijagnostičke svrhe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-247">**PromptCorrelation** - the prompt correlation ID for diagnostic purpose</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-248">**PromptEndTime** - vreme kada je upit završen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-248">**PromptEndTime** - the time when the prompt ended</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-249">**PromptStartTime** - vreme kada je upit započet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-249">**PromptStartTime** – the time when the prompt started</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-250">**SessionEndTime** - vreme kada je sesija događaja završena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-250">**SessionEndTime** - the time when the event session ended</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-251">**ShowUIResult** - vraćeni kôd rezultata iz upita korisničkog interfejsa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-251">**ShowUIResult** – the result code returned from the prompt UI</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-252">**StartTag** - oznaka gde počinje upit Win32</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-252">**StartTag** – the tag where Win32 prompt started</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-253">**Timeout** - vreme kada je upit istekao</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-253">**Timeout** - the time when the prompt is timed out</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-254">**WasIdentitySignedOut** – da li je korisnik je odjavljen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-254">**WasIdentitySignedOut** - whether the user is signed out</span></span>

### <a name="officematsactionofficewin32-officematsactionofficewinrt"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-255">Office.MATS.actionofficewin32, Office.MATS.actionofficewinrt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-255">Office.MATS.actionofficewin32, Office.MATS.actionofficewinrt</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-256">Sledeći opisi se odnose na događaje Win32 i WinRT (ime zavisi od platforme)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-256">The following description applies for both Win32 and WinRT events (the name depends on platform.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-257">Microsoft Auth Telemetry System (MATS) se prikuplja kada Office pokuša da preuzme token potvrde identiteta, ili tiho ili putem upita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-257">Microsoft Auth Telemetry System (MATS) is collected when Office attempts to acquire an authentication token, either silently or through prompting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-258">Kada pokušaj preuzimanja ne uspe, šalju se i informacije o grešci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-258">When acquisition attempts fail, error information is included.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-259">Ovi događaji pomažu korisnicima da izbegnu unošenje neispravne identifikacije tako što će:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-259">These events help our users avoid entering broken authentication states by:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-260">1\) Utvrditi da li klijent može uspešno da pribavi token potvrde identiteta ili se nalazi u neispravnom stanju potvrde identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-260">1\) Identifying whether clients can successfully obtain an authentication token or have entered a broken authentication state.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-261">2\) Proceniti da li su promene koje su se desile u klijentu ili uslugama dovele do kritičnih regresija u korisničkom iskustvu potvrde identiteta i pouzdanosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-261">2\) Evaluate when changes occur on the client or services, whether they result in critical regressions in the user's authentication experience and reliability</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-262">3\) Kada dođe do greške, ovi signali emituju bitne kodove grešaka odgovornih komponenata (kôd Office klijenta, biblioteke potvrde identiteta, upravne usluge) i mogu se koristiti za trijažu, dijagnozu i ublažavanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-262">3\) When failures occur, these signals emit important failure codes from the responsible component (Office client code, authentication libraries, or authority services) which can be used for triage, diagnosis and mitigation</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-263">4\) Ovi signali napajaju razne spremnosti otpreme i nadgledanja ispravnosti koja šalju upozorenja da bi naši inženjeri mogli brzo da odreaguju i da smanje vreme ublažavanja kritičnih grešaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-263">4\) These signals power various ship readiness and health monitors which fire alerts so our engineers can engage quickly and reduce the time to mitigation of critical failures.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-264">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-264">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-265">**Actiontype** - koja biblioteka potvrde identiteta se koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-265">**Actiontype** - Which authentication library is used</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-266">**Appaudience** - da li je aplikacija napravljena za internu ili spoljnu upotrebu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-266">**Appaudience** - Is the app build for internal or external use</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-267">**Appforcedprompt** - da li aplikacija poništava keš i nameće pojavljivanje upita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-267">**Appforcedprompt** - Did the app override cache and force a prompt to be shown</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-347">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_x\_ms\_request\_id** - Dodatni zahtev koji je obezbedio ID za ADAL uslugu u HTTP zaglavlju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-347">**Microsoft\_ADAL\_x\_ms\_request\_id** – Additional request ID provided in HTTP header to service by ADAL.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-348">**Platform** - Win32/WinRT/Android/iOS/Mac</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-348">**Platform** - Win32/WinRT/Android/iOS/Mac</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-349">**Scenarioid** - GUID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-349">**Scenarioid** – GUID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-350">Različiti događaji mogu da pripadaju samo jednom scenariju, npr. on može da dodaje novi nalog, ali postoji više različitih upita koji se javljaju kao deo tog scenarija.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-350">Multiple events may belong to a single scenario, e.g. the scenario may be adding a new account but there are multiple prompts that occur as part of that scenario.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-351">Ovaj ID omogućava da se korelacija dogodi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-351">This ID enables correlation to happen.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-352">**Sessionid** - GUID identifikacija za pokretanje sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-352">**Sessionid** - GUID identifying the boot session</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-353">**Skdver** - Verzija SDK MATS klijenta koja se koristi za sačinjavanje ovih podataka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-353">**Skdver** - Version of MATS client SDK used to produce this data</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-354">**Starttime** - Vreme kada je pozvana akcija\*pokretanja MATS API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-354">**Starttime** - Time at which the Start\*Action MATS API was called</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-355">**Tenantid** - GUID identifikacija zakupca kojoj autorizovani korisnika pripada (u slučajevima kada to nije ADAL).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-355">**Tenantid** - GUID identifying the tenant the authenticated user belongs to (in non-ADAL cases).</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-356">**Uploadid** - Jedinstveni GUID za ovaj događaj koji se koristi za uklanjanje duplikata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-356">**Uploadid** - Unique GUID for this event, used for de-duping</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-357">**Wamapi** - Određuje koji je WAM API pozvan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-357">**Wamapi** - Identifies which WAM API is called</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-358">**Wamtelemetrybatch** - Trenutno nekorišćeno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-358">**Wamtelemetrybatch** - Currently unused.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-359">U budućnosti će omogućiti WAM komponenti da odašilje dodatne informacije koje se tiču događaja potvrde identiteta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-359">In the future, allows the WAM component to dispatch additional information regarding the authentication event.</span></span>

### <a name="onenotesigninssoexternalappsaccountfound"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-360">OneNote.SignIn.SSOExternalAppsAccountFound</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-360">OneNote.SignIn.SSOExternalAppsAccountFound</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="62abc-361">Ovaj događaj se evidentira kada se na listi naloga, koju obezbeđuje TokenSharingManager, nalazi nalog sa važećim tokenom osvežavanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-361">This event is logged when an account with a valid refresh token is found among the list of accounts provided by TokenSharingManager.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="62abc-362">Ovaj slučaj je specifičan za jedinstveno prijavljivanje (SSO).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-362">This scenario is specific to Single Sign-on (SSO).</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="62abc-363">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-363">The following fields are collected:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-364">**AccountType** - Evidentira tip naloga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-364">**AccountType** - the type of account being configured</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-365">**ProviderPackageID** - Evidentira ID paketa aplikacije koji je obezbedio ovaj nalog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-365">**ProviderPackageID** - Logs the package ID of the app that provided this account</span></span>

### <a name="onenotesigninssoexternalappsinvalidaccount"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-366">OneNote.SignIn.SSOExternalAppsInvalidAccount</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-366">OneNote.SignIn.SSOExternalAppsInvalidAccount</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-367">Ovaj događaj se evidentira kada dođe do greške prilikom pokušaja pribavljanja tokena osvežavanja za nalog sa liste naloga koju obezbeđuje TokenSharingManager.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-367">This event is logged when there was an error when attempting to obtain a refresh token for an account in the list of accounts provided by TokenSharingManager.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-368">Ovaj slučaj je specifičan za jedinstveno prijavljivanje (SSO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-368">This scenario is specific to Single Sign-on (SSO)</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="62abc-369">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-369">The following fields are collected:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-370">**RawError** - Evidentira neobrađenu grešku dobijenu prilikom pokušaja pribavljanja tokena osvežavanja za dati nalog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-370">**RawError** - Logs the raw error obtained when attempting to get a refresh token with the given account</span></span>

### <a name="onenotestickynotesfetchtokencompleted"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-371">OneNote.StickyNotes.FetchTokenCompleted</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-371">OneNote.StickyNotes.FetchTokenCompleted</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="62abc-372">Ovaj događaj se evidentira nakon potvrde identiteta, kada je preuzimanje tokena osvežavanja završeno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-372">This event is logged post authentication, once fetching of refresh token is completed.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="62abc-373">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-373">The following fields are collected:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-374">**ErrorMessage** - Evidentira poruku o grešci ako preuzimanje tokena nije uspelo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-374">**ErrorMessage** - If fetching of token failed, this would log the error message</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-375">**Result** - Evidentira rezultat pokušaja preuzimanja tokena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-375">**Result** - Logs the result of token fetching attempt</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-376">**StickyNoteAccountType** - Evidentira tip naloga za koji je aplikacija pokušala da preuzme token osvežavanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-376">**StickyNoteAccountType** - Logs type of the account for which the app was trying to fetch refresh token</span></span>


## <a name="click-to-run-events"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-377">Događaji „Klikni i pokreni“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-377">Click-to-Run events</span></span>

### <a name="officeclicktorunbootstrapper"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-378">Office.ClickToRun.Bootstrapper</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-378">Office.ClickToRun.Bootstrapper</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-379">Podešavanje sistema Office i prikupljanje podataka o zalihama kada korisnik pokreće Office setup.exe da bi izmenio svoje instalirane Office proizvode.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-379">Office set up and inventory data collected when the user is running Office setup.exe to modify their installed Office products.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-380">Koristi se za merenje uspeha / neuspeha instalacije sistema Office koju je u potpunosti započeo korisnik, uključujući i preduslovne provere.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-380">Used to measure success / failure of a full user-initiated Office installation including pre-requisite checks.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-381">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-381">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-382">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_ErrorCode** - Kôd greške koji nismo uspeli da sredimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-382">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_ErrorCode** – The error code we failed with</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-383">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_ErrorSource** - Funkcija koju nismo uspeli da sredimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-383">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_ErrorSource** – The function we failed in</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-384">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_FailingState** - Deo koji nismo uspeli da sredimo u boostrapperbootstrapper-u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-384">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_FailingState** – The part that we failed in the boostrapperbootstrapper</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-385">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_OExceptionType** - Vrsta izuzetka koji nismo uspeli da sredimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-385">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_OExceptionType** – The type of exception we failed with</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-386">**Data\_Culture** - Jezičke postavke kojima pokrećemo exe datoteku, npr. en-us</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-386">**Data\_Culture** - the culture we are running this exe with, i.e. en-us</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-387">**Data\_HashedOLSToken** - sha-256 heš tokena koji nam daje OLS usluga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-387">**Data\_HashedOLSToken** - a sha-256 hash of a token the OLS service gives us</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-388">**Data\_Platfom** - x64 ili x86 instalacija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-388">**Data\_Platform** - x64 or x86 install</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-389">**Data\_PrereqFailure\_Type** - Neuspeli preduslov na koji smo naišli, npr. operativni sistem nije podržan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-389">**Data\_PrereqFailure\_Type** – The prerequisite failure we hit, ie. the operating system is not supported</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-390">**Data\_ProductReleaseId** - Proizvod koji instaliramo, npr. Office 365 ProPlus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-390">**Data\_ProductReleaseId** - Product we’re installing, i.e. Office 365 ProPlus</span></span>

### <a name="officeclicktoruncorruptioncheck"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-391">Office.ClickToRun.CorruptionCheck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-391">Office.ClickToRun.CorruptionCheck</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-392">Podešavanje sistema Office i prikupljanje podataka o zalihama kada klijent „Klikni i pokreni“ pokreće proveru oštećenja da bi proverio da li su Office binarne datoteke ispravne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-392">Office set up and inventory data collected when Click-to-Run client is running a corruption check to make sure that Office binaries are correct.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-393">Koristi se za merenje oštećenja binarnih datoteka sistema Office i određivanje binarnih datoteka koje su oštećene.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-393">Used to measure corruption of Office binaries, and which binaries are corrupt.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-394">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-394">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-395">**Data\_Active -** Manifest trenutnog protoka koji proveravamo na disku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-395">**Data\_Active -** The current stream manifest we’re checking on disk</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-396">**Data\_ActivePackages -** koje pakete sadrži manifest</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-396">**Data\_ActivePackages -** what packages the manifest contains</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-397">**Data\_ActiveVersion -** verzija manifesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-397">**Data\_ActiveVersion -** the version of the manifest</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-398">**Data\_AddFileCount -** koliko datoteka dodajemo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-398">**Data\_AddFileCount -** how many files we’re adding</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-399">**Data\_AddFileFiles -** uzorak datoteke koju dodajemo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-399">**Data\_AddFileFiles -** a sample of the files we’re adding</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-400">**Data\_CompressionLevel -** kako su datoteke kompresovane</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-400">**Data\_CompressionLevel -** how the files are compressed</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-401">**Data\_CorruptionCheckLevel -** koliko detaljno proveravamo oštećenja, faze</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-401">**Data\_CorruptionCheckLevel -** how deeply we’re checking for corruption, stages</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-402">**Data\_CorruptSizeCount -** koliko datoteka je oštećeno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-402">**Data\_CorruptSizeCount -** how many files have a corrupt size</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-403">**Data\_CorruptSizeFiles -** uzorak datoteka koje su oštećene</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-403">**Data\_CorruptSizeFiles -** a sample of the files that have a corrupted size</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-404">**Data\_CorruptSizeCount -** koliko datoteka ima oštećenu verziju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-404">**Data\_CorruptVersionCount -** how many files have a corrupted version</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-405">**Data\_CorruptSizeFiles -** uzorak datoteka koje imaju oštećenu verziju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-405">**Data\_CorruptVersionFiles -** a sample of the files that have a corrupted version</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-406">**Data\_FileBadDigestCount -** koliko datoteka nismo uspeli da otvorimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-406">**Data\_FileBadDigestCount -** how many files we failed to open</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-407">**Data\_FileBadDigestFiles -** uzorak datoteka koje nismo mogli da otvorimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-407">**Data\_FileBadDigestFiles -** a sample of the files that we were unable to open</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-408">**Data\_FileNotSignedCount -** datoteke koje nisu prijavljene</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-408">**Data\_FileNotSignedCount -** have many files that aren’t signed</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-409">**Data\_FileNotSignedFiles -** uzorak datoteka koje nisu prijavljene</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-409">**Data\_FileNotSignedFiles -** a sample of the files that aren’t signed</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-410">**Data\_FileNotTrustedCount -** koliko datoteka nije pouzdano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-410">**Data\_FileNotTrustedCount -** how many files aren’t trusted</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-411">**Data\_FileNotTrustedFiles -** uzorak datoteka koje nisu pouzdane</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-411">**Data\_FileNotTrustedFiles -** a sample of the files that we don’t trust</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-412">**Data\_IncompleteFileCount -** koliko datoteka izgleda nepotpuno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-412">**Data\_IncompleteFileCount -** how many files seem to be incomplete</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-413">**Data\_IncompleteFileFiles -** uzorak datoteka koje su nepotpune</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-413">**Data\_IncompleteFileFiles -** a sample of the files that are incomplete</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-414">**Data\_KeepFileCount -** koliko datoteka ne koristimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-414">**Data\_KeepFileCount -** how many files we’re not doing anything to</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-415">**Data\_KeepFileFiles -** uzorak datoteka koje čuvamo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-415">**Data\_KeepFileFiles -** a sample of files we’re keeping</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-416">**Data\_KeepIncompleteFileCount -** koliko datoteka ne menjamo iako su nepotpune</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-416">**Data\_KeepIncompleteFileCount -** how many files we’re not changing despite them being incomplete</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-417">**Data\_KeepIncompleteFileFiles -** uzorak datoteka koje čuvamo, a koje su nepotpune</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-417">**Data\_KeepIncompleteFileFiles -** a sample of the files we’re keeping that are incomplete</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-418">**Data\_MismatchSizeCount -** koliko ima datoteka čija se veličina ne poklapa sa veličinom našeg manifesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-418">**Data\_MismatchSizeCount -** how many files have a size that doesn’t match our manifest</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-419">**Data\_MismatchSizeFiles -** uzorak datoteka koje se ne podudaraju u veličini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-419">**Data\_MismatchSizeFiles -** a sample of the files that are mismatched in size</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-420">**Data\_MismatchVersionCount -** koliko datoteka ima verziju koja je drugačija od verzije našeg manifesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-420">**Data\_MismatchVersionCount -** how many files that have a version different than our manifest</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-421">**Data\_CorruptSizeFiles -** uzorak datoteka koje se ne podudaraju u verzijama</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-421">**Data\_MismatchVersionFiles -** a sample of the files that have mismatched versions</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-422">**Data\_MissingFileCount -** koliko datoteka nedostaje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-422">**Data\_MissingFileCount -** how many files seem to be missing</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-423">**Data\_IncompleteFileFiles -** uzorak datoteka koje nedostaju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-423">**Data\_MissingFileFiles -** a sample of the files that are missing</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-424">**Data\_NotToBeStreamedFileCount -** koliko datoteka ne delimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-424">**Data\_NotToBeStreamedFileCount -** how many files we’re not streaming</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-425">**Data\_RemoveFileCount -** koliko datoteka uklanjamo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-425">**Data\_RemoveFileCount -** how many files we’re removing</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-426">**Data\_RemoveFileFiles -** uzorak datoteka koje uklanjamo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-426">**Data\_RemoveFileFiles -** a sample of the files we’re removing</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-427">**Data\_StreamUnitsMismatchCount -** koliko datoteka ima jedinica koje se ne podudaraju sa jedinicama manifesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-427">**Data\_StreamUnitsMismatchCount -** how many files have units that don’t match the manifest</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-428">**Data\_StreamUnitsMismatchFiles -** uzorak datoteka čije se jedinice ne podudaraju u protoku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-428">**Data\_StreamUnitsMismatchFiles -** a sample of the files that have a stream with units mismatched</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-429">**Data\_TimeElapsed -** koliko vremena je bilo potrebno za proveru oštećenja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-429">**Data\_TimeElapsed -** how long we took to check for corruption</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-430">**Data\_UpdateFileCount -** koliko datoteka ažuriramo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-430">**Data\_UpdateFileCount -** how many files we’re updating</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-431">**Data\_UpdateFileFiles -** uzorak datoteka koje dodajemo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-431">**Data\_UpdateFileFiles -** a sample of the files we’re adding</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-432">**Data\_Working -** novi manifest koji proveravamo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-432">**Data\_Working -** the new manifest we’re checking</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-433">**Data\_WorkingVersion -** verzija novog manifesta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-433">**Data\_WorkingVersion -** the version of the new manifest</span></span>

### <a name="officeclicktorunodt"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-442">Office.ClickToRun.ODT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-442">Office.ClickToRun.ODT</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-443">Podešavanje sistema Office i prikupljanje podataka o zalihama kada IT administrator pokreće „Klikni i pokreni“ setup.exe alatku za primenu programskog paketa Office da bi izmenio korisnikove instalirane Office proizvode.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-443">Office set up and inventory data collected when an IT Admin is running the Office Deployment Tool Click-to-Run setup.exe to modify their users’ installed Office products.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-444">Koristi se za merenje uspeha / neuspeha instalacije sistema Office koju je u potpunosti započeo IT administrator, uključujući i preduslovne provere.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-444">It is used to measure success / failure of full IT Admin initiated Office installations including pre-requisite checks.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-445">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-445">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-446">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_ErrorCode-** Kôd greške koji nismo uspeli da sredimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-446">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_ErrorCode-** The error code we failed with</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-447">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_ErrorSource-** Funkcija koju nismo uspeli da sredimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-447">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_ErrorSource-** The function we failed in</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-448">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_FailingState** - Deo koji nismo uspeli da sredimo u boot-strapper-u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-448">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_FailingState-** The part that we failed in the boot-strapper</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-449">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_OExceptionType-** Vrsta izuzetka koji nismo uspeli da sredimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-449">**Data\_BootStrapperStateFailure\_OExceptionType-** The type of exception we failed with</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-450">**Data\_ConfigurationHost-** Host od kog je stigla datoteka configuration.xml</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-450">**Data\_ConfigurationHost-** The host where the configuration.xml came from</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-451">**Data\_ConfigurationId-** ID koji dobijamo od datoteke configuration.xml</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-451">**Data\_ConfigurationId-** The ID we get from a configuration.xml</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-452">**Data\_ConfigurationSource-** Odakle je stigla datoteka configuration.xml</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-452">**Data\_ConfigurationSource-** We the configuration.xml came from</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-453">**Data\_Culture-** Jezičke postavke kojima pokrećemo exe datoteku, npr. en-us</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-453">**Data\_Culture-** the culture we are running this exe with, i.e. en-us</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-454">**Data\_HashedOLSToken-** sha-256 heš tokena koji nam daje OLS usluga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-454">**Data\_HashedOLSToken-** a sha-256 hash of a token the OLS service gives us</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-455">**Data\_MigrateArchRequest-** ako premeštamo korisnika sa sistema x86 na sistem x64 i obratno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-455">**Data\_MigrateArchRequest-** If we are migrating the user from x86 to x64 or vice-versa</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-456">**Data\_MigrateArchRequestValid-** ako smatramo da je zahtev za premeštanje validan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-456">**Data\_MigrateArchRequestValid-** If we believe the migrate request is valid</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-457">**Data\_Platfom-** x64 ili x86 instalacija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-457">**Data\_Platform-** x64 or x86 install</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-458">**Data\_PlatformMigratedFrom-** Početna platforma, npr. x86</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-458">**Data\_PlatformMigratedFrom-** Starting platform, i.e. x86</span></span>

### <a name="officeclicktorunrepomanlogger"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-462">Office.ClickToRun.RepomanLogger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-462">Office.ClickToRun.RepomanLogger</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-463">Izveštaji o statusu novog „Klikni i pokreni“ kanala ažuriranja („Repoman“) i ako uspešno preuzima i primenjuje Office ispravke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-463">Reports on the status for the new Click-to-Run update pipeline (“Repoman”) and if it successfully downloads and applies Office updates.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-468">**ErrorDetails -**  Dodatni detalji o poslednjoj grešci koja se dogodila u „Klikni i pokreni“ kanalu Repoman.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-468">**ErrorDetails -**  Additional error details of the last error that occurred in the Click-to-Run Repoman pipeline.</span></span>
 
  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-469">**ErrorMessage -** Poruka o poslednjoj grešci koja se dogodila u „Klikni i pokreni“ kanalu Repoman.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-469">**ErrorMessage -** The message of the last error that occurred in the Click-to-Run Repoman pipeline.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-470">**OpenStreamSessionSucceeded -** Tačno ako kanal uspešno kreira sesiju za striming Office ažuriranja, netačno ako je ne kreira.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-470">**OpenStreamSessionSucceeded -** True if the pipeline successfully creates a session for streaming an Office update, false if not.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-471">**RepomanErrorMessage -** Poruka o grešci primljena od repoman.dll.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-471">**RepomanErrorMessage -** The error message received from the repoman.dll.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1408">**BytesFromGroupPeers** – Bajtovi ravnopravnih uređaja u grupi, samo za preuzimanja pomoću optimizacije isporučivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1408">**BytesFromGroupPeers -** Bytes from group peers, only for downloads using Delivery Optimization</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1409">**BytesFromHttp** – Bajtovi http protokola, samo za preuzimanja pomoću optimizacije isporučivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1409">**BytesFromHttp -**    Bytes from http, only for downloads using Delivery Optimization</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1410">**ByteFromInternetPeers** – Bajtovi ravnopravnih uređaja na internetu, samo za preuzimanja pomoću optimizacije isporučivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1410">**ByteFromInternetPeers -**   Bytes from internet peers, only for downloads using Delivery Optimization</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1411">**BytesFromLanPeers** – Bajtovi ravnopravnih uređaja na Lan mreži, samo za preuzimanja pomoću optimizacije isporučivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1411">**BytesFromLanPeers -**   Bytes from Lan peers, only for downloads using Delivery Optimization</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1412">**CancelledJobs** – Broj otkazanih zahteva u sesiji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1412">**CancelledJobs -**    Number of cancelled requests in the session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1413">**Connected** – Pokazuje da li postoji veza sa izvorom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1413">**Connected -**   Whether connected to source</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1414">**ErrorCode** – Kôd poslednje greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1414">**ErrorCode -**   The code of last error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1415">**ErrorDetails** – Detalji poslednje greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1415">**ErrorDetails -**     The detail of last error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1417">**ErrorSource** – Izvor poslednje greške, na primer Connection, LoadFile ili LoadRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1417">**ErrorSource -** The source of last error, e.g. Connection, LoadFile or LoadRange</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1418">**FailedJob** – Broj zahteva u sesiji koji nisu uspeli</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1418">**FailedJob -**   Number of failed requests in the session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1419">**FileSize** – Veličina resursa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1419">**FileSize -**    Size of the resource</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1420">**SourcePathNoFilePath** – Izvorna putanja resursa. Izveštava se samo o http izvoru, a filtrira se putanja do lokalne datoteke ili UNC putanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1420">**SourcePathNoFilePath -**    Source path of the resource only http source is reported, local file path or UNC path is filtered</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1421">**SucceededJobs** – Broj uspešnih zahteva u sesiji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1421">**SucceededJobs -**   Number of succeeded requests in the session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1422">**TotalJobs** – Ukupan broj zahteva u sesiji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1422">**TotalJobs -**    Total number of requests in the session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1423">**TotalRequestedBytes** – Ukupan broj traženih bajtova u sesiji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1423">**TotalRequestedBytes -**  Total requested bytes in the session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1424">**TotalTransferTime** – Ukupno vreme prenosa u sesiji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1424">**TotalTransferTime -**   Total transfer time in the session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1425">**TransferredBytes** – Ukupan broj prenetih bajtova u sesiji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1425">**TransferredBytes -**    Total transferred bytes in the session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1426">**TransportType** – Tip prenosa, na primer (optimizacija isporučivanja u memoriji, HTTP, usluga inteligentnog prenosa u pozadini)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1426">**TransportType -**   Type of transport, e.g. (In memory Delivery Optimization, HTTP, Background Intelligent Transfer Service)</span></span>



### <a name="officeclicktoruntransportexperimentaltransportpipelinecreatetransport"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1427">Office.ClickToRun.Transport.ExperimentalTransport.PipelineCreateTransport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1427">Office.ClickToRun.Transport.ExperimentalTransport.PipelineCreateTransport</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1428">Podešavanje sistema Office i prikupljanje podataka o zalihama kada klijent „Klikni i pokreni“ kreira protok za prenos da bi preuzeo Office datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1428">Office set up and inventory data collected when the Click-to-Run client is creating a transport stream to download Office files.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1429">Koristi se za utvrđivanje ispravnosti raznih tehnologija za prenos (npr. HTTP, BITS, DO), što je od presudnog značaja za ispravno preuzimanje instalacije i ažuriranja za sistem Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1429">Used for determining the health of various transport technologies (e.g., HTTP, BITS, DO) which is critical to downloading Office properly for installation and updates.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1430">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1430">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1431">**Data\_IsForeGroundStreaming** – Ako emitujemo u prednjem planu ili u pozadini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1431">**Data\_IsForeGroundStreaming** – If we’re streaming in the foreground or background</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1432">**Data\_IsInstallMode** – 1 ako instaliramo i preuzimamo datoteke, 0 ako to ne radimo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1432">**Data\_IsInstallMode** – 1 if we’re installing and downloading files, 0 if not</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1433">**Data\_SourceProtocol –** Ako preuzimamo sa mreže za podatke sadržaja, CDN, sa računara na koji instaliramo, lokalno, ili iz resursa sa lokalne mreže,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1433">**Data\_SourceProtocol –** If we’re downloading from a content data network, CDN, the machine we’re installing on, local, or from a resource on the local area network,</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1434">**Data\_Status** – Uspešno ili neuspešno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1434">**Data\_Status** – Success or failure</span></span> 

### <a name="officeclicktorunupdatestatus"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1435">Office.ClickToRun.UpdateStatus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1435">Office.ClickToRun.UpdateStatus</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1436">Podešavanje sistema Office i prikupljanje podataka o zalihama kada klijent „Klikni i pokreni“ završava status ažuriranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1436">Office set up and inventory data collected when the Click-to-Run client is finishing an update status</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1437">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1437">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1438">**Data\_build** - Trenutno instalirana verzija sistema Office</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1438">**Data\_build** - Currently installed Office version</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1439">**Data\_channel** – Kanal na kom se nalazi korisnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1439">**Data\_channel** – The channel that the user is on</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1440">**Data\_errorCode** – Kôd sa celim brojevima koji određuje tip greške ako je do nje došlo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1440">**Data\_errorCode** – An integer code specifying the type of error that occurred, if there was one</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1441">**Data\_errorMessage** – Niska koja opisuje grešku ako je do nje došlo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1441">**Data\_errorMessage** – A string giving a description of the error that occurred, if there was one</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1442">**Data\_status** – Kratki status onoga što se dogodili tokom ažuriranja, kao što je uspešnost ili završeno preuzimanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1442">**Data\_status** – A short status of what happened during the update, such as Succeeded or Downloaded</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1443">**Data\_targetBuild -** - Verzija koju pokušavamo da nadogradimo na Office</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1443">**Data\_targetBuild -** -The Office version that we are attempting to update to</span></span>


### <a name="officeclicktorununiversalbootstrapperapplication"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1444">Office.ClickToRun.UniversalBootstrapper.Application</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1444">Office.ClickToRun.UniversalBootstrapper.Application</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1445">Izveštava o rezultatu pokušaja potpunog instaliranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1445">Reports the result of the end-to-end installation attempt</span></span>

 - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1446">**ErrorCode** – Vrednost celog broja povezana sa nekontrolisanim izuzetkom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1446">**ErrorCode –**  Integer value associated with an unhandled exception</span></span>

 - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1447">**ErrorDetails** – Niska koja opisuje lokaciju na kojoj je došlo do nekontrolisanog izuzetka (funkcija, datoteka, broj reda, dodatni parametri koji postavlja izbacivač)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1447">**ErrorDetails –**   String that describes the location of where an unhandled exception occurred (function, file, line number, additional parameters set by the thrower)</span></span>

 - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1448">**ErrorMessage** – Niska definisana u trenutku javljanja nekontrolisanog izuzetka koja opisuje prirodu otkazivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1448">**ErrorMessage –**   String defined at the point where an unhandled exception was thrown, describing the nature of the failure</span></span>

 - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1449">**ErrorType** – Niska koja opisuje kategoriju nekontrolisanog izuzetka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1449">**ErrorType –**  String describing the category of an unhandled exception</span></span>

 - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1450">**ExitCode** – Vrednost celog broja povezana sa rezultatom pokretanja programa koji se pokreće prilikom pokretanja računara koja označava uspeh naspram određenih tipova otkazivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1450">**ExitCode –**   Integer value associated with the result of running the bootstrapper, indicating success vs. specific types of failure</span></span>

### <a name="officeclicktorununiversalbootstrappercalculateparameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1451">Office.ClickToRun.UniversalBootstrapper.CalculateParameters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1451">Office.ClickToRun.UniversalBootstrapper.CalculateParameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1452">Izveštava o radnji koja donosi programske odluke u vezi sa unosom prikupljenim pomoću događaja CollectParameters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1452">Reports on the action that reason over the input collected using CollectParameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1453">**BitField** – Vrednost celog broja argumenta BitField koji pokazuje da li je zatražen eksplicitan kanal instalacije/ažuriranja (mesečni, spori za insajdere, brzi za insajdere, polugodišnji, polugodišnji za izabrane korisnike)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1453">**BitField –**    Integer value of the BitField argument which tells us whether an explicit installation/update channel requested (Monthly, Insiders Slow, Insiders Fast, Semi-Annual, Semi-Annual Targeted)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1454">**ChannelID** – Vrednost celog broja koja predstavlja numeričku vrednost izabranog kanala instalacije/ažuriranja (mesečni, spori za insajdere, brzi za insajdere, polugodišnji, polugodišnji za izabrane korisnike)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1454">**ChannelID –**   Integer representing the enum value of the selected update/install channel (Monthly, Insiders Slow, Insiders Fast, Semi-Annual, Semi-Annual Targeted, Invalid)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1455">**CMDMode** – Prepoznatljiva niska koja odgovara celokupnom prekidaču za režim otkrivenom u cmd argumentima prebačena u izvršnu datoteku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1455">**CMDMode –** The friendly string corresponding to which overall mode switch was detected in the cmd arguments passed to the exe.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1456">**C2RClientUICulture** – Jezik klijenta za verziju „Klikni i pokreni“ koji treba instalirati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1456">**C2RClientUICulture –**  Culture of the C2R Client to install</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1457">**ErrorCode** – Vrednost celog broja povezana sa nekontrolisanim izuzetkom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1457">**ErrorCode –**   Integer value associated with an unhandled exception</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1458">**ErrorDetails** – Niska koja opisuje lokaciju na kojoj je došlo do nekontrolisanog izuzetka (funkcija, datoteka, broj reda, dodatni parametri koji postavlja izbacivač)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1458">**ErrorDetails –**    String that describes the location of where an unhandled exception occurred (function, file, line number, additional parameters set by the thrower)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1459">**ErrorMessage** – Niska definisana u trenutku javljanja nekontrolisanog izuzetka koja opisuje prirodu otkazivanja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1459">**ErrorMessage –**    String defined at the point where an unhandled exception was thrown, describing the nature of the failure</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1460">**ErrorType** – Niska koja opisuje kategoriju nekontrolisanog izuzetka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1460">**ErrorType –**   String describing the category of an unhandled exception</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1461">**ExcludedApps** – Niska koja navodi imena pojedinačnih Office aplikacija za koje je zatraženo da se isključe iz instaliranih Office programskih paketa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1461">**ExcludedApps –**    String listing the individual Office application names requested to be excluded from the Office suites installed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1462">**InstalledCabVersion** – Već je instalirana verzija 16.0.xxxxx.yyyyy klijenta za Office „Klikni i pokreni“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1462">**InstalledCabVersion –** The "16.0.xxxxx.yyyyy" version of an Office C2R Client already installed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1463">**InstalledProductVersion** – Već je instalirana verzija 16.0.xxxxx.yyyyy Office „Klikni i pokreni“ proizvoda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1463">**InstalledProductVersion –** The "16.0.xxxxx.yyyyy" version of an Office C2R product already installed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1464">**IsC2RServiceRunning** – Bulova zastavica koja pokazuje da li usluga lokalne mašine modernog klijenta za verziju „Klikni i pokreni“ normalno radi na uređaju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1464">**IsC2RServiceRunning –** Boolean flag that indicates whether a modern C2R Client's local machine service is up and running on the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1465">**IsElevatedFlagSet** – Bulova zastavica koja pokazuje da li je program koji se pokreće prilikom pokretanja računara već pokušao da dobije podizanje na nivo administratora</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1465">**IsElevatedFlagSet –**   Boolean flag indicating whether the bootstrapper has already attempted to gain admin elevation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1466">**IsFireFlyInstalled** – Bulova zastavica koja pokazuje da li je trenutno instaliran klijent za Office 2013 RTM C2R</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1466">**IsFireFlyInstalled –**  Boolean flag indicating whether the Office 2013 RTM C2R Client is currently installed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1467">**IsFireflyServiceRunning** – Bulova zastavica koja pokazuje da li usluga lokalne mašine modernog klijenta za 2013 RTM C2R normalno radi na uređaju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1467">**IsFireflyServiceRunning –** Boolean flag that indicates whether a 2013 RTM C2R Client's local machine service is up and running on the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1468">**IsOfficeInstalled** – Bulova zastavica koja pokazuje da li je već instaliran moderni klijent za Office</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1468">**IsOfficeInstalled –**   Boolean flag indicating whether a modern Office client is installed already</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1469">**OfficeCultures** – Serijalizovana lista Office jezika koje treba instalirati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1469">**OfficeCultures –**  Serialized list of Office cultures to be installed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1470">**OfficeSourceType** – Prepoznatljiva niska povezana sa numeričkom vrednošću instalacionog izvora (CDN, HTTP, UNC, CMBITS, DVD, LOCAL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1470">**OfficeSourceType –**    Friendly string associated with the enum value of the installation source (CDN, HTTP, UNC, CMBITS, DVD, LOCAL)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1471">**Origin** – Vrednost niske koja saopštava koji od podržanih izvora (Portoriko [PR], Singapur [SG], Dablin [DB]) treba koristiti za početni protok instalacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1471">**Origin –**  String value telling us which of the supported origins (Puerto Rico [PR], Singapore [SG], Dublin [DB]) should be used for initial installation streaming</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1472">**PlatformFromLink** – Niska koja pokazuje podrazumevani broj bitova x86 | x64 | sistema Office zatražen od usluge podešavanja za verziju „Klikni i pokreni“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1472">**PlatformFromLink –**    String indicating the requested x86|x64|default bitness of Office requested from the C2R Setup service</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1473">**PlatformOfExistingInstallation** – Niska koja pokazuje da li je x86-bitna ili x64-bitna verzija sistema Office već instalirana na uređaju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1473">**PlatformOfExistingInstallation –**  String indicating whether x86 vs. X64 Office was already installed on the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1474">**PlatformToInstall** – Niska koja pokazuje konačnu odluku u vezi sa time da li treba instalirati x86-bitnu ili x64-bitnu verziju sistema Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1474">**PlatformToInstall –**   String indicating the final decision on whether x86 vs. X64 Office should be installed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1475">Mogućnosti su: automatsko pokretanje, konfigurisanje, potrošačka verzija, preuzimanje, pomoć i program za pakovanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1475">Possibilities are:  autorun, configure, consumer, download, help, packager</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1476">**PRID** – Vrednost niske koja predstavlja traženi ID izdanja proizvoda u slučaju korisničke instalacije (na primer, „O365ProPlusRetail“)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1476">**PRID –**    String value representing the requested Product Release ID in a consumer installation scenario (for example, "O365ProPlusRetail")</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1477">**PridsToMigrateFromCentennial-** Niska Office proizvoda koje treba migrirati iz instalacija prodavnice u uslugu „Klikni i pokreni“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1477">**PridsToMigrateFromCentennial-** String of Office products to migrate from Store installations to Click-To-Run</span></span>
