<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1486">Izveštava o radnji koja čita označeni unos iz ugrađenog potpisa izvršne datoteke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1486">Reports on the action that reads tagged input from the exe's embedded signature.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1487">Ovo je nedokazani koncept koji prethodna iteracija izvršne datoteke setup.exe nije primenila i to je ono na šta se oslanjamo prilikom prenošenja izbora korisnika u vezi sa proizvodom/jezikom/brojem bitova sa veb stranice u proces unutar izvršne datoteke setup.exe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1487">This is an unproven concept the previous iteration of setup.exe did not implement, and is what we're relying on to carry the user's product/language/bitness choices from web page to in-process within setup.exe.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1542">**PreReqResult** – Numerička vrednost celog broja rezultata izvršavanja provera preduslova (prolaz/neuspeh/ponovno pokretanje)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1542">**PreReqResult –**    The integer enum value of the result when PreReq checks were performed (pass/fail/re-run)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1543">**UnexpectedAction** – Ima vrednost „tačno“ ako je isplanirano da se zadatak UnexpectedAction (slučaj greške) pokrene tokom ovog instaliranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1543">**UnexpectedAction –**    "true" if the UnexpectedAction task (an error case) is scheduled to run during this installation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1544">**VersionToInstall** – Vrednost niske verzije 16.0.xxxxx.yyyyy sistema Office koja se instalira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1544">**VersionToInstall –**    String value of the Office "16.0.xxxxx.yyyyy" version that is being installed</span></span>


### <a name="officeserviceabilitymanagerinventoryaddonresults"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1545">Office.ServiceabilityManager.InventoryAddon.Results</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1545">Office.ServiceabilityManager.InventoryAddon.Results</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1546">Ovaj događaj se evidentira kada se završi poziv upućen funkciji webservice, obavljen u okviru dodatka, Upravljača Servisiranja Inventara „Klikni i pokreni“, bez obzira na to da li je uspešan ili neuspešan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1546">This event is logged when the call to the webservice made within the Click-to-Run Serviceability Manager Inventory add-on completes, irrespective of whether it succeeds or fails.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1547">Ovo je u suštini poslednja operacija u okviru dodatka za praćenje celokupnog statusa operacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1547">This is essentially the last operation within the add-on to track the overall operation status.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1548">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1548">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

-  <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1549">**WebCallSource** - Vrednost nabrajanja (navedena kao ceo broj) koja ukazuje na dodatak „Upravljač servisiranja“, koji je bio izvor poziva:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1549">**WebCallSource** - An enumeration value (specified as an integer) indicating the Serviceability Manager add-on that was the source of the call:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1550">Inventar: 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1550">Inventory: 0</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1551">Konfiguracija inventara: 1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1551">Inventory Configuration: 1</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1552">Smernice za inventar: 2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1552">Inventory Policy: 2</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1553">Status mreže inventara: 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1553">Inventory Network Status: 3</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1554">**Result** - Zastavice numeričkog koda greške dobijene iz Office webservice API-ja za pozivanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1554">**Result** - Numeric error code flags returned by the Office webservice call APIs.</span></span>

### <a name="officeserviceabilitymanagerwebservicefailure"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1555">Office.ServiceabilityManager.WebserviceFailure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1555">Office.ServiceabilityManager.WebserviceFailure</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1556">Ovaj događaj se evidentira svaki put kada je poziv, koji je upućen funkciji webservice i obavljen u okviru dodatka „Upravljač servisiranja klikni i pokreni“, neuspešan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1556">This event is logged whenever a call to a webservice made within a Click-to-Run Serviceability Manager add-on fails.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1557">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1557">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1558">**Add-on** - Dodatak „Upravljač servisiranja klikni i pokreni“ u okviru kog je upućen poziv funkciji webservice.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1558">**Add-on** - The Click-to-Run Serviceability Manager add-on from which the webservice call was made.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1559">Ovo može da ima vrednosti kao što su inventar, mogućnost upravljanja, itd, kodirani kao numeričke vrednosti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1559">This can have values like inventory, manageability, etc. encoded as a numeric value.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1560">**Correlation ID** - Nasumično generisan GUID koji je specifičan za trenutnu instancu i koji se šalje funkciji webservice za korelaciju poziva između klijenta i servera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1560">**Correlation ID** - A randomly generated GUID specific to the current instance that is sent to the webservice to correlate calls between the client and the server.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1561">**ErrorInfo** - Informacije o numeričkom kodu greške dobijene iz Office webservice API-ja za pozivanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1561">**ErrorInfo** - Numeric error code information returned by the Office webservice call APIs.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1562">**Function** - Funkcija u kodu u kojoj je obavljen trenutni poziv.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1562">**Function** - The function in the code from which the current call occurred.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1563">**Status** - HTTP statusni kôd dobijen iz poziva upućenog funkciji webservice, npr. 404, 500, itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1563">**Status** - The HTTP status code returned by the call to the webservice, e.g. 404, 500, etc.</span></span>

### <a name="officeexperimentationtriggeranalysis"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1579">Office.Experimentation.TriggerAnalysis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1579">Office.Experimentation.TriggerAnalysis</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1580">Ovaj događaj pomaže u analizi opsega korištenja proizvoda i metrika performansi (kao što su padovi, prekidi, itd.) podskupa korisnika ili uređaja koji imaju pravo na korišćenje funkcije, i na taj način pomažu u osiguravanju ispravnog rada proizvoda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1580">This event helps scope analysis of product usage and performance metrics (such as crashes, hangs, etc.) to the subset of users or devices that are eligible to use the feature, thereby helping ensure that the product is working properly.</span></span>

## <a name="licensing-events"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1588">Događaji licenciranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1588">Licensing events</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingaccepteulaforcurrentlicense"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1589">Office.Licensing.AcceptEulaForCurrentLicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1589">Office.Licensing.AcceptEulaForCurrentLicense</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1591">Koristi se za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom ili lošem statusu, za ispravnost sistema i za svrhe dijagnostikovanja ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1591">It is used to detect if the user is in a good state or not, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingactivation"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1595">Office.Licensing.Activation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1595">Office.Licensing.Activation</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1596">Kada podesimo licencu na računaru, pokušavamo da je aktiviramo tako što pozivamo uslugu AVS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1596">Post setting up the license on the machine, we attempt to activate the license by calling the AVS service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1597">Ovo izveštava o ishodu poziva za aktivaciju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1597">This reports the result of the activation call</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1598">Od suštinskog je značaja za određivanje koliko korisnika nailazi na probleme prilikom aktivacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1598">It is critical in detecting how many users are facing activation issues.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1599">Imamo detektor anomalija koji otkriva bilo koju regresiju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1599">We have anomaly detection to detect any regression.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1600">Ovo je veoma važno jer spoljno zavisimo od usluge AVS, a ovaj signal upućuje na to da li su naši spoljni partneri ispravni.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1600">This is super critical as we have an external dependency on AVS and this signal points whether our external partners are healthy .</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1601">Takođe se koristi i za dijagnostičke svrhe i ispravnost sistema ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1601">It is also used for diagnostic purposes and system health if a user reports an issue with their machine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1602">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1602">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1603">**Acid** – GUID identifikator koji predstavlja Office proizvod za koji je korisnik licenciran </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1603">**Acid** - A GUID identifier representing the Office product that the user is licensed for</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1604">**ReferralData** – Identifikator OEM proizvođača koji je instalirao Office na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1604">**ReferralData** – Identifier of the OEM that installed Office on the machine</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingactivationwizard"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1605">Office.Licensing.ActivationWizard</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1605">Office.Licensing.ActivationWizard</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1606">Ako iz nekog razloga nismo u mogućnosti da automatski aktiviramo licencu, prikazujemo korisniku čarobnjaka za aktivaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1606">If we are not able to automatically activate the license for some reason, we show an activation wizard to the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1607">Ovo obaveštava da je čarobnjak za aktivaciju prikazan korisniku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1607">This reports that the wizard is being shown to the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1608">Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu i ne nedostaje mu funkcionalnost, za ispravnost sistema i za dijagnostičke svrhe ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1608">It is critical in detecting if the user is in a good state and not missing functionality, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1609">Ovaj događaj ne prikuplja polja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1609">This event collects no fields.</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingenforcesigninqualified"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1610">Office.Licensing.EnforceSignInQualified</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1610">Office.Licensing.EnforceSignInQualified</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1611">Ovo je signal koji nam govori da li je uspešan eksperiment koji smo pokrenuli da bismo nametnuli prijavljivanje korisnika kao deo licenciranja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1611">This is the signal that tells us if the experiment that we are running to enforce user sign as part of licensing is successful.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1612">Od suštinskog je značaja za otkrivanje uspešnosti ili neuspešnosti eksperimenta koji nameće prijavljivanje korisnika, što je neophodan korak u nizu modernog licenciranja. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1612">This is critical in detecting the success or failure of the experiment that is forcing the users to login which is a required step for the modern licensing stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1613">Neuspešno prijavljivanje će onemogućiti da korisnici koriste aplikaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1613">Failure to sign in will result in the users not being able to use the app.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1614">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1614">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1615">**Qualified** - Određuje da li je korisnik kvalifikovan za nametnuto prijavljivanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1615">**Qualified** – Identifies whether the user qualified for the sign in enforcement</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingexpirationdialogshown"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1616">Office.Licensing.ExpirationDialogShown</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1616">Office.Licensing.ExpirationDialogShown</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1617">Ovo se prikuplja kada korisniku prikažemo dijalog isteka koji pokazuje da je njihova licenca istekla. Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu i da li ima svu funkcionalnost, za ispravnost sistema i za dijagnostičke svrhe ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1617">This is collected when we show the expiration dialog to the user that says that their license has expired It is critical in detecting if the user is in a good state and not missing functionality, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1618">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1618">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1619">**LicNotificationState** - Brojač koji nam govori koja vrsta obaveštenja se prikazuje korisniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1619">**LicNotificationState** – An enumerator that tells us what kind of notification is being shown to the user</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingfullvalidation"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1620">Office.Licensing.FullValidation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1620">Office.Licensing.FullValidation</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1621">Ovo se prikuplja pri svakoj sesiji koja izveštava o statusu licence na računaru i greškama koje se prikazuju korisniku zbog kojih nije u mogućnosti da koristi aplikaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1621">This is collected on every session that reports the licensing state of the machine and reports the errors that the user is seeing due to which they are not able to use the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1622">Ovaj događaj ukazuje na to da li je korisnikov računar ispravan ili nije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1622">This event indicates if the user's machine is healthy or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1623">Za ovaj događaj imamo podešen detektor anomalija da bismo označili da li regresija uzrokuje neispravno ponašanje korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1623">We have anomaly detection set up for this event to indicate if a regression is causing bad user behavior.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1624">Takođe je od suštinske važnosti pri dijagnostikovanju korisničkih problema i za nadgledanje ispravnosti sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1624">This is also critical when diagnosing user issues and for monitoring system health</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1625">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1625">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1626">**Acid** – GUID identifikator koji predstavlja Office proizvod za koji je korisnik licenciran </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1626">**Acid** – A GUID identifier representing the Office product that the user is licensed for</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1627">**IsSessionLicensing** - Da li je trenutno pokrenuta u režimu aktivacije deljenog računara ili nije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1627">**IsSessionLicensing** – Whether we are currently running under shared computer activation mode or not</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1628">**LicenseCategory** – Kategorija Office licence koju koristi korisnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1628">**LicenseCategory** – Category of the Office license that the user is using</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1629">**Licenses** – Lista sa imenima svih Office licenci koje se nalaze na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1629">**Licenses** – List of names of all the  Office licenses that are present on the machine</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1630">**LicenseStatuses** – Status svih Office licenci koje se nalaze na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1630">**LicenseStatuses** – Status of all the Office licenses present on the machine</span></span> 

### <a name="officelicensinggetentitlement"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1631">Office.Licensing.GetEntitlement</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1631">Office.Licensing.GetEntitlement</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1632">Ovo prikupljamo kad korisnik podešava uređaj, a mi pozivamo uslugu licenciranja da bismo otkrili da li prijavljeni korisnik ima prava na sistem Office ili nema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1632">We collect this when the user is setting up a device and we call our licensing service to detect if the logged in user has an Office entitlement or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1633">Ovo izveštava o ishodu tog poziva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1633">This reports the result of that call.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1634">Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu,a nedostaje mu funkcionalnost, za ispravnost sistema i za dijagnostičke svrhe ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1634">It is critical in detecting if the user is in a good state and missing functionality, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1635">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1635">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1636">**EntitlementCount** - Broj prava koji korisnik poseduje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1636">**EntitlementCount** – Number of entitlements the user has</span></span>


### <a name="officelicensingheartbeat"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1637">Office.Licensing.Heartbeat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1637">Office.Licensing.Heartbeat</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1638">Prilikom svake sesije proveravamo da li je prošlo 72 sata od poslednje obnove licence i pokušavamo da produžimo rok isteka trenutne licence.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1638">On every session we check if 72 hours have passed since the last license renewal and try to extend the expiry of the current license.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1639">Ovaj događaj izveštava o uspešnosti ili neuspešnosti poziva koji smo uputili da bismo proverili da li možemo da produžimo rok isteka licence i da korisnikovu instalaciju sistema Office održimo u funkciji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1639">This event reports the success or failure of the call that we make to ensure we can extend the expiry of the license and keep the user's Office installation functional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1640">Od suštinske je važnosti pri dijagnostikovanju korisnikovih problema vezanih za pretplatu i uslugu, kao i za otkrivanje regresija kod korisnika koji su već aktivirali pretplatu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1640">It is critical in diagnosing subscription related issues and service issues for the user and is critical in detecting regressions for already activated subscription users.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1641">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1641">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1642">**Mode** - Numeričko predstavljanje paketa licenci za sistem Office koji se koristi na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1642">**Mode** – An enumerator representation of the Office licensing stack that is being used on this machine</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensinginclientpinredemptioncallpinredemptionapi"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1643">Office.Licensing.InClientPinRedemption.CallPinRedemptionAPI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1643">Office.Licensing.InClientPinRedemption.CallPinRedemptionAPI</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1644">Ova telemetrija prati rezultate aktivacije pozivanja usluge pomoću Office pin-a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1644">This telemetry tracks the results of Office’s pin redemption service call.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1645">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1645">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1646">**ClientTransactionId** - Jedinstveni identifikator pozivanja usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1646">**ClientTransactionId** - Unique identifier for the service call.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1647">**ErrorCategory** - Svaki tip greške može da spada u uopšteniju kategoriju, kao što je „Mogućnost ponovnog pokušaja“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1647">**ErrorCategory** - Each error type can fall into a more general category, such as “Retryable”.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1648">**ErrorType** - Razlog neuspeha, kao što je „VećJeAktiviranoOdStraneDrugeOsobe“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1648">**ErrorType** - Reason of failure, such as “AlreadyRedeemedByOther”.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1649">**InAFOFlow** - Bulova vrednost koja pokazuje da li se nalazimo u AFO aktivacionom toku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1649">**InAFOFlow** - A Boolean indicating if we are in the AFO redemption flow.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1650">**StatusCode** - Rezultat pozivanja usluge koji se sastoji od jedne reči, kao što je „Napravljeno“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1650">**StatusCode** - One-word result of the service call, such as “Created”.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1651">**StatusMessage** - Detalji o statusnom kodu, kao što je „Uspešno obezbeđeno“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1651">**StatusMessage** - Details of the status code, such as ‘Successfully provisioned."</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1652">**UsingNulApi** - Bulova vrednost koja pokazuje da li se koristi novi paket licenci.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1652">**UsingNulApi** - A Boolean indicating if we are using the new licensing stack.</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensinginrfm"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1653">Office.Licensing.InRFM</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1653">Office.Licensing.InRFM</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1654">Ako uređaj uđe u režim smanjene funkcionalnosti, šaljemo ovaj signal da bismo naznačili da se računar ne nalazi u ispravnom stanju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1654">If the device enters reduced functionality mode, we send out this signal to indicate that the machine is not in a healthy state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1655">Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu,a nedostaje mu funkcionalnost, za ispravnost sistema i za dijagnostičke svrhe ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1655">It is critical in detecting if the user is in a good state and missing functionality, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1656">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1656">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1657">**ACID** – GUID identifikator koji predstavlja Office proizvod za koji je korisnik licenciran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1657">**ACID** - A GUID identifier representing the Office product that the user is licensed for</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1658">**DaysRemaining** – Broj dana koji je preostao do isteka trenutne Office licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1658">**DaysRemaining** - Number of days remaining before the current Office license expires</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1659">**Mode** – Numeričko predstavljanje paketa licenci za sistem Office koji se koristi na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1659">**Mode** – An enumerator representation of the Office licensing stack that is being used on this machine</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1660">**ProductName** - Ime proizvoda koji korisnik trenutno koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1660">**ProductName** – Name of the product that the user is currently using</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1661">**Reason** - Kôd greške koji ukazuje na razlog trenutnog statusa licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1661">**Reason** – The error code indicating the reason for the current status of the license</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensinginstallkey"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1662">Office.Licensing.InstallKey</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1662">Office.Licensing.InstallKey</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1666">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1666">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1667">**Prid** - Ime grupe proizvoda za koju se instalira ključ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1667">**Prid** – Name of the product group for which a key is being installed</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1668">**SkuId** – GUID identifikator koji predstavlja Office proizvod za koji se instalira ključ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1668">**SkuId** - A GUID identifier representing the Office product for which a key is being installed</span></span> 

### <a name="officelicensinginvokelicensewizard"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1669">Office.Licensing.InvokeLicenseWizard</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1669">Office.Licensing.InvokeLicenseWizard</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1673">**LicenseStatus** – Status Office licence koju korisnik koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1673">**LicenseStatus** – Status of the Office license that the user is using</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensinglicensingbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1675">Office.Licensing.LicensingBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1675">Office.Licensing.LicensingBar</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1676">Ako uređaj naiđe na probleme sa licenciranjem i dođe do toga da korisniku prikažemo sabirnicu, šaljemo ovaj signal koji izveštava i o tipu sabirnice koja je prikazana korisniku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1676">If the device is facing licensing issues and we end up showing a busbar to the user, we send out this signal which also reports the type of busbar shown to the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1677">Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu i ne nedostaje mu funkcionalnost, za ispravnost sistema i za dijagnostičke svrhe ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1677">It is critical in detecting if the user is in a good state and not missing functionality, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1680">**Title** - Naziv sabirnice licenciranja koja je prikazana korisniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1680">**Title** – The title of the licensing busbar that was shown to the user</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1681">**Type** - Tip sabirnice licenciranja koja je prikazana korisniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1681">**Type** – The type of the licensing busbar shown to the user</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensinglicexitofficeprocess"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1682">Office.Licensing.LicExitOfficeProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1682">Office.Licensing.LicExitOfficeProcess</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1697">**Acid** – GUID identifikator koji predstavlja Office proizvod za koji je korisnik licenciran </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1697">**Acid** - A GUID identifier representing the Office product that the user is licensed for</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1702">Ovaj događaj ne prikuplja nikakva polja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1702">This event collects no fields.</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingnulfetcherfetchmodelfromols"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1703">Office.Licensing.Nul.Fetcher.FetchModelFromOls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1703">Office.Licensing.Nul.Fetcher.FetchModelFromOls</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1704">Kada je uređaj na modernom paketu licence, trudimo se da datoteku licence preuzmemo direktno iz usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1704">When the device is on the modern licensing stack, we try to get a license file directly from the service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1705">Ovaj događaj izveštava o uspešnosti ili neuspešnosti, kao i o kôdu greške kod poziva usluge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1705">This event reports the success or failure along with the error code of that service call.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1706">Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu kod modernog paketa licence, za ispravnost sistema i za svrhe dijagnostikovanja ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1706">It is critical to detect if the user is in a good state on the modern licensing stack, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine .</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1707">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1707">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1708">**MetadataValidationResult** - Rezultat provere valjanosti metapodataka licence da bi se proverilo da nisu neovlašćeno promenjeni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1708">**MetadataValidationResult** – Result of the validation of the metadata of the license to verify that it has not been tampered with</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1709">**SignatureValidationResult** - Rezultat provere valjanosti potpisa da bi se proverilo da nije neovlašćeno promenjen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1709">**SignatureValidationResult** – Result of the validation of the signature of the license to verify that it has not been tampered with</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingnulvalidationfullvalidation"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1710">Office.Licensing.Nul.Validation.FullValidation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1710">Office.Licensing.Nul.Validation.FullValidation</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1711">Ovo se prikuplja pri svakoj sesiji uređaja koji je pokrenut na modernom paketu licence.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1711">This is collected on every session of a device that is running on the modern licensing stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1712">Izveštava o statusu licence na računaru i greškama koje se prikazuju korisniku zbog kojih nije u mogućnosti da koristi aplikaciju. Ovaj događaj ukazuje na to da li je ispravan korisnikov računar na modernom paketu licence.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1712">It reports the licensing state of the machine and reports the errors that the user is seeing due to which they are not able to use the app This event indicates if the user's machine is healthy on the modern licensing stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1713">Za ovaj događaj imamo podešen detektor anomalija da bismo označili da li regresija uzrokuje neispravno ponašanje korisnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1713">We have anomaly detection set up for this event to indicate if a regression is causing bad user behavior.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1714">Takođe je od suštinske važnosti pri dijagnostikovanju korisničkih problema i za nadgledanje ispravnosti sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1714">This is also critical when diagnosing user issues and for monitoring system health.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1715">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1715">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1716">**Acid** – GUID identifikator koji predstavlja Office proizvod za koji je korisnik licenciran </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1716">**Acid** - A GUID identifier representing the Office product that the user is licensed for</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1717">**AllAcids** - Lista svih GUID proizvoda za koje je korisnik trenutno licenciran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1717">**AllAcids** – List of all the GUIDs of the product that the user is currently licensed for</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1718">**Category** – Kategorija Office licence koju korisnik koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1718">**Category** - Category of the Office license that the user is using</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1719">**DaysRemaining** – Broj dana koji je preostao do isteka trenutne Office licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1719">**DaysRemaining** – Number of days remaining before the current Office license expires</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1720">**LicenseId** - Alfanumerički identifikator licence koji je izdat korisniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1720">**LicenseId** – An alphanumeric identifier of the license that was issued to the user</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1721">**LicenseType** – Tip Office licence koju korisnik koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1721">**LicenseType** - Type of the Office license that the user is using</span></span> 

### <a name="officelicensingofficeclientlicensingdolicensevalidation"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1722">Office.Licensing.OfficeClientLicensing.DoLicenseValidation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1722">Office.Licensing.OfficeClientLicensing.DoLicenseValidation</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1723">Ovo su metapodaci licenciranja koji se prikupljaju pri svakom pokretanju i koji izveštavaju o proizvodu, statusu, tipu i drugim svojstvima licence koja su važna za određivanje skupa funkcija dostupnih korisniku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1723">This is licensing metadata that is collected from the device on every boot that reports the license acid, license status, type and other properties of the license that are critical in identifying the features set available to the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1724">Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje skupa funkcija koje su dostupne korisniku i da li nedostaje neka funkcionalnost.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1724">This is critical in identifying the feature set available to the user and if any functionality is missing for the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1725">Takođe se koristi i za izračunavanje broja dnevno/mesečno aktivnih korisnika, kao i za različite izveštaje koje koriste razni timovi u svim Office oblastima, jer nam to govori koji tip proizvoda koristi korisnik, da li je u pitanju pretplata na proizvod i da li nedostaje neka bitna funkcionalnost.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1725">It is also used for Daily active users/Monthly active user calculations and various other reports by various teams across Office as this tells the type product that the user is using, whether it is a subscription product and whether they are missing any critical functionality.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1726">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1726">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1727">**FullValidationMode** - Režim koji ukazuje na to da se nalazimo u potpunoj validaciji verifikacije licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1727">**FullValidationMode** – Mode indicating that we are in full validation of license verification</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1728">**IsRFM** - Ukazuje na to da li se korisnik nalazi u režimu smanjene funkcionalnosti ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1728">**IsRFM** – Indicates whether the user is in reduced functionality mode or not</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1729">**IsSCA** - Ukazuje na to da li se nalazimo u režimu aktivacije deljenog računara</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1729">**IsSCA** – Indicates whether we are running in Shared computer activation mode</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1730">**IsSubscription** - Ukazuje na to da li korisnik koristi licencu za pretplatu ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1730">**IsSubscription** – Indicates whether the user is using a subscription license or not</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1731">**IsvNext** - Ukazuje na to da li koristimo novi moderni paket licenciranja ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1731">**IsvNext** – Indicates whether we are using the new modern licensing stack or not</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1732">**LicenseCategory** – Kategorija Office licence koju koristi korisnik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1732">**LicenseCategory** - Category of the Office license that the user is using</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1733">**LicenseStatus** – Status Office licence koju korisnik koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1733">**LicenseStatus** – Status of the Office license that the user is using</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1734">**LicenseType** – Tip Office licence koju korisnik koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1734">**LicenseType** - Type of the Office license that the user is using</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1735">**LicensingACID** – GUID identifikator koji predstavlja Office proizvod za koji je korisnik licenciran</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1735">**LicensingACID** - A GUID identifier representing the Office product that the user is licensed for</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1736">**OlsLicenseId** - Alfanumerički identifikator licence koji je izdat korisniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1736">**OlsLicenseId** - An alphanumeric identifier of the license that was issued to the user</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1737">**SkuIdIsNull** - Ukazuje na to da li smo naišli na grešku i ne znamo koji proizvod korisnika pokreće</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1737">**SkuIdIsNull** – Indicates whether we encountered an error and don’t know the product that the user is running</span></span> 

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1738">**SlapiIsNull** - Ukazuje na to da li smo naišli na problem u popunjavanju jednog od objekata licenciranja </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1738">**SlapiIsNull** – Indicates whether we encountered a problem in populating one of the licensing objects</span></span> 

### <a name="officelicensingonlinerepair"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1739">Office.Licensing.OnlineRepair</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1739">Office.Licensing.OnlineRepair</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1740">Ovaj događaj se pokreće ako iz nekog razloga nismo u mogućnosti da aktiviramo korisnika i moramo da im prikažemo dijalog koji mu traži da se priključi na mrežu i pokuša da prati korake za popravak.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1740">If we are not able to activate a user for some reason and have to show them a dialog that asks them to go online and try repair steps, this event is fired.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1741">Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu i ne nedostaje mu funkcionalnost, za ispravnost sistema i za dijagnostičke svrhe ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1741">It is critical in detecting if the user is in a good state and not missing functionality, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1742">Ovaj događaj ne prikuplja polja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1742">This event collects no fields.</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingoobetrybuychoice"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1743">Office.Licensing.OOBE.TryBuyChoice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1743">Office.Licensing.OOBE.TryBuyChoice</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1744">Korisnicima, koji imaju unapred instaliran Office na novim računarima i koji ne poseduju prava na sistem Office, prikazuje se dijalog pomoću kog mogu da isprobaju, kupe ili unesu šifru proizvoda da bi dobili licencu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1744">Users with pre-installed Office on new machines who have no Office entitlement are shown a dialog through which they can try, buy or enter a product key to get licensed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1745">Ovaj događaj beleži radnju korisnika u dijalogu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1745">This event captures the user action on the dialog.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1746">Ovaj događaj se koristi za praćenje korisničke radnje izvršene u dijalogu koji se prikazuje korisnicima bez prava na Office, kod kojih je Office unapred instaliran na računaru, s namerom da pomogne pri utvrđivanju da li korisnik ima licencu ili ne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1746">This event is used to track the user action taken on the dialog shown to users with no Office entitlement where Office was pre-installed on the machine and helps determining if the user is licensed or unlicensed by design.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1747">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1747">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1748">**Buy** - Obaveštava da li je korisnik kliknuo na dugme „Kupi“ ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1748">**Buy** - Tells if the user clicked on the buy button or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1749">**ForceAutoActivate** - Obaveštava da li treba pokušati aktivaciju u aplikaciji ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1749">**ForceAutoActivate** - Tells if in-app activation should be attempted or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1750">**GoBackToSignIn** - Obaveštava da li je korisnik želeo ponovo da se prijavi (verovatno sa drugim nalogom)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1750">**GoBackToSignIn** - Tells if the user wanted to sign in again (possibly with another account)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1751">**IsPin** - Obaveštava da li je korisnik uneo pin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1751">**IsPin** - Tells if the user entered a pin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1752">**ProductKey** - Obaveštava da li je korisnik pokušao da unese šifru proizvoda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1752">**ProductKey** - Tells if the user tried to enter a product key</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1753">**Try** - Obaveštava da li je korisnik kliknuo na dugme „Isprobaj“ ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1753">**Try** - Tells if the user clicked on the try button or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1754">**UserDismissed** - Obaveštava da li je korisnik odbacio dijalog i da li se samim tim nalazi u grejs periodu ili u režimu smanjene funkcionalnosti jer nije izabrao da kupi ili isproba Office</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1754">**UserDismissed** - This tells if the user dismissed the dialog and thus would be in grace or reduced functionality mode because they didn’t choose to buy office or get a trial</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingpurchase"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1755">Office.Licensing.Purchase</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1755">Office.Licensing.Purchase</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1756">Sprovodimo eksperiment koji korisniku pruža mogućnost da isproba i podesi automatsko plaćanje za Office direktno iz aplikacije bez potrebe da napušta aplikaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1756">We have an experiment that gives the user an option to try and setup autopay for Office directly from an app without ever leaving the context of the app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1757">Ovo izveštava o uspešnosti ili neuspešnosti datog eksperimenta, kao i o kôdu greške.
