<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1758">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1758">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1759">**StorePurchaseStatus** - Predstavlja kôd greške/uspeha poziva za kupovinu koji je upućen in Windows prodavnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1759">**StorePurchaseStatus** – Represents the error code/success code of the purchase call that was made through windows store</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingsearchforsessiontoken"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1760">Office.Licensing.SearchForSessionToken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1760">Office.Licensing.SearchForSessionToken</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1761">Ako se korisnik nalazi u režimu aktivacije deljenog računara, pokušavamo da pronađemo token sesije na računaru koji dozvoljava korisniku da koristi aplikaciju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1761">If the user is running under shared computer activation mode, we try to search for a session token on the machine which allows the user to use the app.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1762">Ovaj događaj izveštava o uspešnosti ili neuspešnosti datog scenarija, kao i o kôdu greške. Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu i ne nedostaje mu funkcionalnost, za ispravnost sistema i za dijagnostičke svrhe ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1762">This event reports the success orfailure of the scenario along with the error code It is critical in detecting if the user is in a good state and not missing functionality, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1763">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1763">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1764">**LoadLicenseResult** - Predstavlja kôd greške/uspeha za to da li smo bili u mogućnosti da učitamo licence za trenutnog korisnika</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1764">**LoadLicenseResult** – Represents the error code/success code of whether we were able to load the licenses for the current user</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1765">**OpportunisticTokenRenewalAttempted** - Ukazuje na to da li smo pokušali da oportunistički obnovimo token korisnikove sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1765">**OpportunisticTokenRenewalAttempted** – Indicates whether we attempted to renew the user’s session token opportunistically</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1766">**SetAcidResult** - Predstavlja kôd greške/uspeha za to da li smo bili u mogućnosti da podesimo acid na očekivane vrednosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1766">**SetAcidResult** – Represent the error code/success code of whether we were able to set the acid to the expected value</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingshownewdeviceactivationdialog"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1767">Office.Licensing.ShowNewDeviceActivationDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1767">Office.Licensing.ShowNewDeviceActivationDialog</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1768">Prilikom prvog pokretanja Office aplikacije, pokušaćemo da prikažemo dijalog za prijavljivanje koji je unapred popunjen sa akreditivima koje je korisnik upotrebio da bi preuzeo sistem Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1768">On the first boot of an Office app, we will try to show a sign in dialog pre-populated with the credentials the user employed to download Office.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1769">Korisnik zatim može da nastavi prijavljivanje sa tim akreditivima, da koristi druge ili da odbaci dijalog.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1769">The user can then continue to sign-in with those credentials, use different credentials or dismiss the dialog.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1770">Ovaj događaj izveštava o aktivnosti koju je izvršio korisnik kada mu je prikazan dijalog.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1770">This event reports the action taken by the user when presented with this dialog.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1771">Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu kod modernog paketa licence, za ispravnost sistema i za svrhe dijagnostikovanja ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1771">It is critical for detecting if a user is in a good state on the modern licensing stack, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1772">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1772">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1773">**UserAction** - Identifikator aktivnosti koju je izvršio korisnik kada mu je prikazan dijalog.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1773">**UserAction** – Identifier for the action taken by the user when presented with the dialog.</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingskutoskuconversion"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1774">Office.Licensing.SkuToSkuConversion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1774">Office.Licensing.SkuToSkuConversion</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1775">U sklopu licenciranja korisnika, ako treba da promenimo korisnikov SKU iz jednog u drugi, šaljemo ovaj signal zajedno sa kodom uspeha ili neuspeha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1775">As part of licensing the user, if we have to change the user's SKU from one SKU to another, we send this signal out along with the success or failure code.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1776">Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu, a nedostaje mu funkcionalnost, za ispravnost sistema i za dijagnostičke svrhe ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1776">It is critical in detecting if the user is in a good state and missing functionality, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1777">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1777">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1778">**DestinationSku** - Ime SKU na koji trenutno instalirani proizvod treba da bude konvertovan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1778">**DestinationSku** – Name of the SKU to which the currently installed product should be converted to</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1779">**PendingAcid** - Ime proizvoda čija je SKU konverzija na čekanju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1779">**PendingAcid** – Id of the product for which a SKU conversion is pending</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1780">**SourceSku** - Ime prvobitnog SKU koji je instaliran na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1780">**SourceSku** – Name of the original SKU that was installed on the machine</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1781">**UninstallProduct** - Ukazuje na to da li će stari proizvod biti deinstaliran u sklopu konverzije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1781">**UninstallProduct** – Indicates whether the old product will be uninstalled as part of the conversion</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingtelemetryflowolsresults"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1782">Office.Licensing.TelemetryFlow.OLSResults</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1782">Office.Licensing.TelemetryFlow.OLSResults</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1783">Kada korisnik nema licencu, upućujemo nekoliko poziva usluzi da bi dobio licencu i aktivirao svoj Office proizvod.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1783">When a user is unlicensed, we make several service calls to get the user into a licensed state and to activate their Office product.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1784">Ovaj događaj se pokreće prilikom pozivanja Office usluge licenciranja da bi se proverilo da li korisnik poseduje prava.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1784">This event gets triggered on calling the Office Licensing Service to check if the user has entitlements.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1785">Ovaj događaj se koristi za praćenje ispravnosti korisničkog licenciranja nakon pozivanja Office usluge licenciranja i ispravnosti Office klijenta nakon pokušaja aktivacije sistema Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1785">This event is going to be used to track the user licensing health after calling the Office Licensing Service and the Office Client health after attempting to get Office activated.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1786">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1786">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1787">**EntitlementPickerShown** - Obaveštava da li korisnik poseduje više prava i da li je morao ručno da odabere neko od njih da bi dobio licencu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1787">**EntitlementPickerShown** - Tells if the user had multiple entitlements and if the user had to manually choose from them to get licensed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1788">**GetAuthResult** - Obaveštava o različitim stanjima u kojima se može naći klijent, na primer, ako je dobio praznu šifru proizvoda od Office usluge licenciranja ili ako je posedovao prava za drugi proizvod, a Office treba da se konvertuje u novi proizvod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1788">**GetAuthResult** - Tells various states the client might be in like if they got an empty product key from the Office Licensing Service or if they were entitled for another product and Office needs to be converted to the new product</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1789">**GetEntitlementsCount** - Obaveštava o broju prava koji korisnik poseduje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1789">**GetEntitlementsCount** - Tells the number of entitlements the user has</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1790">**GetEntitlementsSucceeded** - Obaveštava da li je poziv upućen API usluzi Office licenciranja radi preuzimanja korisničkog prava bio uspešan ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1790">**GetEntitlementsSucceeded** - Tells if the call to an Office Licensing Service API to retrieve the user’s entitlements succeeded or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1791">**GetKeySucceeded** - Obaveštava da li je poziv upućen API usluzi Office licenciranja radi preuzimanja šifre bio uspešan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1791">**GetKeySucceeded** - Tells if the call to an Office Licensing Service API to retrieve a key succeeded</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1792">**GetNextUserLicenseResult** - Obaveštava da li je moderan paket licenci mogao da funkcioniše i da li je korisnik dobio licencu ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1792">**GetNextUserLicenseResult** - Tells if the modern licensing stack was able to work and if the user got licensed or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1793">**InstallKeyResult** - Obaveštava o različitim razlozima zbog kojih se korisnik može nalaziti u lošem stanju, kao što je neuspela aktivacija ili neuspela instalacija šifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1793">**InstallKeyResult** - Tells various reasons why the user might be in a bad state like if activation failed or the installation of the key failed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1794">**NotInitializedBeforeWhileAdding** - Ovo je samo informativno i obaveštava da li je događaj dodat u mapu za upravljanje telemetrijom, a da nije izričito urađena registracija za to</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1794">**NotInitializedBeforeWhileAdding** - This is just informational and tells if the event was added to a telemetry manager map without explicitly registering for it</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1795">**NotInitializedBeforeWhileSending** - Ovo je samo informativno i obaveštava da li je pokušano slanje događaja, a da ranije nije urađena izričita registracija za to u mapi za upravljanje telemetrijom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1795">**NotInitializedBeforeWhileSending** - This is just informational and tells if the event was attempted to be sent without explicitly registering for it in the telemetry manager map before hand</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1796">**SentOnDestruction** - Ovo je samo informativno i obaveštava da li je događaj dodat u mapu za upravljanje telemetrijom, a nije izričito poslat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1796">**SentOnDestruction** - This is just informational and tells if the event was added to a telemetry manager map and wasn’t sent explicitly</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1797">**Tag** - Koristi se da saopšti sa kog mesta u kodu je poslat događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1797">**Tag** - Used for telling where in the code the event was sent from</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1798">**VerifyEntitlementsResult** - Obaveštava o različitim stanjima u kojima se može nalaziti korisnik nakon provere valjanosti prava preuzetih iz Office usluge licenciranja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1798">**VerifyEntitlementsResult** - Tells various states the user might be in after validating the entitlements retrieved from the Office Licensing Service</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingtelemetryflowsearchforbindingresult"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1799">Office.Licensing.TelemetryFlow.SearchForBindingResult</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1799">Office.Licensing.TelemetryFlow.SearchForBindingResult</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1800">OEM proizvođači prodaju računare koji dolaze sa sistemom Office (sa jednogodišnjom ili stalnom pretplatom).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1800">OEMs sell machines that come with Office (one-year subscriptions or perpetual).</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1801">Ovi Office proizvodi su plaćeni kada klijent kupi svoj računar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1801">These Office products are paid for when the customer purchases their machine.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1802">Računari koji su podešeni sa specifičnim ključem registratora (OOBEMode: OEMTA) mogu imati obavezujući Office ugovor koji je povezan sa njima. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1802">Machines that are setup with a specific regkey (OOBEMode: OEMTA) might have an Office binding associated with it.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1803">Kada na takvim računarima pokrenemo Office, izvršavamo provere usluge da bismo videli da li je pronađen obavezujući Office ugovor za odgovarajući računar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1803">When we boot Office on such machines, we perform service checks to see if an Office binding corresponding to the machine is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1804">Ova aktivnost telemetrije prati tačke uspeha i neuspeha u pretraživanju obavezujućeg ugovora da bismo bili sigurni da računari koji ga imaju mogu uspešno da ga preuzmu i da su naše usluge ispravne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1804">This telemetry activity tracks the success and failure points in searching for a binding so that we can ensure that machines that do have a binding can successfully fetch them, and that our services are healthy.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1805">Nakon provere sa našim uslugama, ova aktivnost ne prati računare za koje se ispostavi da nemaju nikakav obavezujući ugovor koji je povezan sa njima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1805">This activity does not track machines that turn out to not have any bindings associated with them after we check with our services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1806">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1806">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1807">**GenuineTicketFailure** - Obaveštava nas o grešci HRESULT prilikom pokušaja preuzimanja originalnog Windows tiketa/šifre proizvoda (WPK) za računar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1807">**GenuineTicketFailure** - Tells us the failure HRESULT when trying to get the machine’s Windows genuine ticket/product key (WPK).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1808">**PinValidationFailure** - Obaveštava nas zašto nije uspeo proces provere valjanosti pin-a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1808">**PinValidationFailure** - Tells us why the pin validation process failed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1809">Moguće greške:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1809">Possible errors:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1810">Blokirana geografska zona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1810">GeoBlocked</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1811">Nevažeći format </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1811">InvalidFormat</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1812">Nevažeći pin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1812">InvalidPin</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1813">Nevažeće stanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1813">InvalidState</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1814">Nevažeća verzija</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1814">InvalidVersion</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1815">Nepoznato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1815">Unknown</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1816">Iskorišćeno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1816">Used</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1817">**PinValidationResult** - Obaveštava nas o rezultatu provere valjanosti pin-a za pin koji nismo uspeli da razbijemo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1817">**PinValidationResult** - Tells us the pin validation result of a pin that we failed to crack.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1818">**Pkpn** - opseg pkpn-a kome pripada pin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1818">**Pkpn** - The pkpn range that the pin belongs to.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1819">**Success** - Pokazuje da smo uspešno preuzeli važeći obavezujući Office ugovor (pin) za računar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1819">**Success** - Indicates that we successfully fetched a valid Office binding (pin) for the machine.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1820">**Tag** - Obaveštava kada smo prestali da pretražujemo obavezujući ugovor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1820">**Tag** - Tells us at which step we stopped searching for a binding.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1821">Moguće oznake:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1821">Possible tags:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1822">0x03113809  Nema internet veze/usluge prilikom provere valjanosti pin-a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1822">0x03113809  No internet/service error while validating pin</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1823">0x0311380a Neuspeh provere valjanosti pin-a, poslato pomoću polja „NeuspehProvereValjanostiPin-a“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1823">0x0311380a Pin validation failure, sent with PinValidationFailure field</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1824">0x0310410f  Uspeh, poslato pomoću polja „Uspeh“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1824">0x0310410f  Success, sent with Success field</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1825">0x0311380d  Greške kod kojih je moguć ponovni pokušaj (problemi sa internet vezom, nepoznate greške)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1825">0x0311380d  Retry-able errors (internet issues, unknown errors)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1826">0x0311380e  Greške kod kojih nije moguć ponovni pokušaj (ponuda obavezujućeg ugovora je istekla)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1826">0x0311380e  Non-retry-able errors (binding offer expired)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1827">0x0311380f  Druge greške (Licenciranje nije moguće)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1827">0x0311380f  Other errors (unable to license)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1828">0x03104111  Nije uspelo razbijanje Office pin-a, poslato pomoću polja „RezultatProvereValjanostiPin-a“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1828">0x03104111  Failed to crack the Office pin, sent with PinValidationResult field</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1829">**WpkBindingFailure** - Obaveštava o kodu greške kod povezivanja Office pin-a sa WPK-om računara.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1829">**WpkBindingFailure** - Tells us the error code of getting the Office pin bound to the machine’s WPK.</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingtelemetryflowshowafodialogs"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1830">Office.Licensing.TelemetryFlow.ShowAFODialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1830">Office.Licensing.TelemetryFlow.ShowAFODialogs</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1831">Nakon uspešnog pribavljanja važećeg Office pin-a koji je povezan sa računarom sa kojim dolazi Office paket, korisniku prikazujemo dijalog za prijavljivanje ili preuzimanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1831">After successfully obtaining a valid Office pin bound to a machine pre-bundled with Office, we show the user either a sign-in dialog or a redemption dialog.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1832">Kada se preuzme pin, prikazujemo dijalog za EULA ugovor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1832">Once the pin is redeemed, we show the EULA dialog.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1833">U sklopu naše modernizacije AFO funkcije, osvežili smo dva dijaloga da bismo preneli više informacija o Office proizvodima koji dolaze sa računarom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1833">As a part of our modernizing AFO feature, we refreshed the two dialogs to convey more information regarding the Office product that comes with the machine.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1834">Ova telemetrija služi za praćenje da li funkcija smanjuje korisničke probleme u preuzimanju njihovog proizvoda, tako što prati tok i tačke izlaska iz procesa preuzimanja (koji dijalog je odbačen).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1834">This telemetry is to track if our feature successfully reduces user friction in redeeming their product by tracking the flow and exit points of the redemption process (which dialog was dismissed).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1835">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1835">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1836">**ActionCreateAccount** - Korisnik bira da napravi nalog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1836">**ActionCreateAccount** - User chose to create an account.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1837">**ActionSignIn** - Korisnik bira da se prijavi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1837">**ActionSignIn** - User chose to sign-in.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1838">**DialogRedemption** - Prikazuje se AFO dijalog za preuzimanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1838">**DialogRedemption** - Showing the AFO redemption dialog.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1839">**DialogSignIn** - Prikazuje se AFO dijalog za prijavljivanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1839">**DialogSignIn** - Showing the AFO sign-in dialog.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1840">**OExDetails** - Detalji o grešci koje dobijemo kada je odbačen dijalog za prijavljivanje sa identitetom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1840">**OExDetails** - The error details we get back when identity’s sign-in dialog was dismissed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1841">**OExType** - Tip greške koji dobijemo kada je odbačen dijalog za prijavljivanje sa identitetom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1841">**OExType** - The error type we get back when identity’s sign-in dialog was dismissed.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1842">**Tag** - Obaveštava nas na kom koraku je korisnik izašao iz AFO procesa preuzimanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1842">**Tag** - Tells us at which step the user exits the AFO redemption process.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1843">Moguće oznake:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1843">Possible tags:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1844">0x0311380b    Korisnik je u dijalogu za preuzimanje odbacio dijalog za prijavljivanje sa identitetom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1844">0x0311380b    User dismissed identity’s sign-in dialog from redemption dialog</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1845">0x0311380c    Nije uspelo automatsko učitavanje identiteta nakon korisničkog prijavljivanja iz dijaloga za preuzimanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1845">0x0311380c    Failed to auto-load an identity post user sign-in from redemption dialog</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1846">0x03113810    Nije uspelo učitavanje demografskih informacija o nalogu (državni kôd, jezik, valuta, ponuda za probnu verziju i željene postavke za reklame)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1846">0x03113810    Failed to load the account’s demographic information (country code, language,   currency, trial offer, and marketing preferences)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1847">0x03113805    Korisnik je u dijalogu za prijavljivanje odbacio dijalog za prijavljivanje sa identitetom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1847">0x03113805    User dismissed identity’s sign-in dialog from sign-in dialog</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1848">0x03113806    Nije uspelo automatsko učitavanje identiteta nakon korisničkog prijavljivanja iz dijaloga za prijavljivanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1848">0x03113806    Failed to auto-load an identity post user sign-in from sign-in dialog</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1849">0x03113807   Nije uspelo automatsko učitavanje identiteta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1849">0x03113807    Failed to auto-load an identity</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1850">0x03113811    Korisnik je zatvorio dijalog za prijavljivanje/preuzimanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1850">0x03113811    User closed the sign-in/redemption dialog</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1851">0x03113812    Korisnik je zatvorio dijalog za prihvatanje EULA ugovora</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1851">0x03113812    User closed the accept EULA dialog</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1852">0x03113808    Korisnik je prihvatio EULA ugovor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1852">0x03113808    User accepted the EULA</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1853">**UseInAppRedemption** - Obaveštava nas da li zadržavamo korisnike u aplikaciji radi preuzimanja ili ih prebacujemo na veb da bi iskoristili svoj preuzeti pin (unapred popunjen).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1853">**UseInAppRedemption** - Tells us if we’re keeping users in-app for redemption or sending them to the web to redeem their fetched pin (pre-populated).</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1854">**UseModernAFO** - Obaveštava nas da li koristimo staro ili novo AFO iskustvo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1854">**UseModernAFO** - Tells us if we’re using the new or old AFO experience.</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingtelemetryflowshowtrybuydialogforoobe"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1855">Office.Licensing.TelemetryFlow.ShowTryBuyDialogForOOBE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1855">Office.Licensing.TelemetryFlow.ShowTryBuyDialogForOOBE</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1856">Kada novi računari imaju unapred instaliran sistem Office, a korisnici ne poseduju prava na njega, prikazujemo dijalog koji korisniku daje opciju da isproba, kupi ili unese šifru proizvoda da bi dobio licencu. Ovaj događaj prati da li je dijalog prikazan. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1856">When new machines have Office pre-installed and the user doesn't have an entitlement we show a dialog which gives the user the option to try, buy or enter a product key so that the user can get licensed and this event tracks if the dialog was shown.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1857">Ovaj događaj nam omogućuje da saznamo da li je dijalog prikazan korisniku kako bi isprobao, kupio ili uneo šifru proizvoda i tako određujemo da li je imao priliku da dobije licencu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1857">This event will help with knowing if the dialog was shown to the user to try, buy or enter the product key and hence will help us determine if the user had the opportunity to get licensed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1858">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1858">The following fields are collected:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1859">**ActiveView** - Obaveštava o id dijaloga koji je prikazan korisniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1859">**ActiveView** - Tells the dialog id shown to the user</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1860">**CurrentOOBEMode** - Obaveštava o unapred instaliranom režimu (režim OOBE, kao što je AFO, OEM, itd.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1860">**CurrentOOBEMode** - Tells the pre-install mode (OOBE mode such as AFO, OEM etc.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1861">**NotInitializedBeforeWhileAdding** - Ovo je samo informativno i obaveštava da li je događaj dodat u mapu za upravljanje telemetrijom, a da nije izričito urađena registracija za to</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1861">**NotInitializedBeforeWhileAdding** - This is just informational and tells if the event was added to a telemetry manager map without explicitly registering for it</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1862">**SentOnDestruction** - Ovo je samo informativno i obaveštava da li je događaj dodat u mapu za upravljanje telemetrijom, a nije izričito poslat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1862">**SentOnDestruction** - This is just informational and tells if the event was added to a telemetry manager map and wasn’t sent explicitly</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1863">**ShowTryButton** - Obaveštava da li je korisniku prikazano dugme „Isprobaj“ u dijalogu ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1863">**ShowTryButton** - Tells if the Try Button was shown to the user on the dialog or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1864">**Tag** - Koristi se da saopšti sa kog mesta u kodu je poslat događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1864">**Tag** - Used for telling where in the code the event was sent from</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingtelemetryflowtrialflow"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1865">Office.Licensing.TelemetryFlow.TrialFlow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1865">Office.Licensing.TelemetryFlow.TrialFlow</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1866">Ovaj događaj se pokreće kada korisnik bez licence, sa unapred instaliranim sistemom Office na računaru, pokušava da dobije probnu verziju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1866">When an unlicensed user of Office pre-installed on a machine is attempting to get a trial, this event gets triggered.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1867">Koristi se da se vidi kojim putem će korisnik ići da bi dobio probnu verziju i da li je došlo do grešaka prilikom njenog preuzimanja putem kupovine u aplikaciji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1867">It is used to see which path the user would follow to get a trial and if there were any errors while getting the trial through in-app purchases.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1868">U zavisnosti od korisničke radnje i rezultata kupovine u aplikaciji, korisnik može da ostane bez licence.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1868">Depending on the user action and the result of the in-app purchase the user could end up being unlicensed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1869">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1869">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1870">**HasConnectivity** - Obaveštava da li korisnik ima vezu sa internetom i u slučaju da nema, može koristiti grejs licencu tokom pet dana ili se može naći u režimu smanjene funkcionalnosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1870">**HasConnectivity** - Tells if the user has internet connectivity and in case there isn’t the user might have to use a grace license for five days or may be in reduced functionality mode</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1871">**InAppTrialPurchase** - Obaveštava da li je probni paket omogućen za pokretanje SDK-a za kupovinu u prodavnici da bi se zabeležio PI i kupila probna verzija unutar aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1871">**InAppTrialPurchase** - Tells if the flight is enabled for launching the Store Purchase SDK to capture PI and purchase a trial from within the application</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1872">**IsRS1OrGreater** - Obaveštava da li je OS verzija novija od verzije RS1 ili ne, pošto SDK za kupovinu u prodavnici treba koristiti samo ako jeste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1872">**IsRS1OrGreater** - Tells if the OS Version is greater than RS1 or not since the Store Purchase SDK should be used only if the OS Version is greater that RS1</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1873">**NotInitializedBeforeWhileAdding**: Ovo je samo informativno i obaveštava da li je događaj dodat u mapu za upravljanje telemetrijom, a da nije izričito urađena registracija za to</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1873">**NotInitializedBeforeWhileAdding**: This is just informational and tells if the event was added to a telemetry manager map without explicitly registering for it</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1874">**OEMSendToWebForTrial** - Obaveštava da li je probni paket omogućen za prebacivanje korisnika na veb da bi preuzeli probnu verziju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1874">**OEMSendToWebForTrial** - Tells if the flight is enabled to send users to the web to redeem a trial</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1875">**StoreErrorConditions** - Obaveštava o različitim uslovima u kojima je moguć neuspeh SDK-a za kupovinu u prodavnici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1875">**StoreErrorConditions** - Tells the various conditions under which the Store Purchase SDK could have failed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1876">**StoreErrorHResult** - Obaveštava o kodu greške koji je dobijen iz SDK-a za kupovinu u prodavnici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1876">**StoreErrorHResult** - Tells the error code returned from the Store Purchase SDK</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1877">**StorePurchaseStatusResult** - Obaveštava o rezultatu poziva SDK-a za kupovinu u prodavnici i o tome da li je korisnik obavio kupovinu, čime se određuje da li treba da dobije licencu kako bi koristio Office</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1877">**StorePurchaseStatusResult** - Tells the result of calling the Store Purchase SDK and if the user made a purchase or not which will help determine if the user should get licensed to use Office</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1878">**Tag** - Koristi se da saopšti sa kog mesta u kodu je poslat događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1878">**Tag** - Used for telling where in the code the event was sent from</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1879">**UserSignedInExplicitly** - Obaveštava da li se korisnik eksplicitno prijavio i u tom slučaju preusmeravamo korisnike na veb za probnu verziju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1879">**UserSignedInExplicitly** - Tells if the user signed in explicitly in which case, we would re-direct users to the web for the trial</span></span>

### <a name="officelicensingusegracekey"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1880">Office.Licensing.UseGraceKey</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1880">Office.Licensing.UseGraceKey</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1881">Ako iz nekog razloga nismo u mogućnosti da licenciramo korisnika, instaliramo „grejs“ ključ i šaljemo signal koji to označava.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1881">For some reason if we are unable to license the user, we install a grace key and send out this signal that signifies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1882">Od suštinske je važnosti za određivanje da li se korisnik nalazi u dobrom statusu,a nedostaje mu funkcionalnost, za ispravnost sistema i za dijagnostičke svrhe ako korisnik prijavi problem na računaru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1882">It is critical in detecting if the user is in a good state and missing functionality, used for system health and used for diagnostic purposes if a user reports an issue with their machine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1883">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1883">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1884">**OpportunisticTokenRenewalAttempted** - Ukazuje na to da smo pokušali oportunističku obnovu za korisnika koji se nalazi u režimu aktivacije deljenog računara</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1884">**OpportunisticTokenRenewalAttempted** – Indicates if we attempted an opportunistic renewal for the user in shared computer activation mode</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1885">**ReArmResult** - Ukazuje na rezultat vraća instaliranog ključa u početno stanje, što može da produži rok trajanje trenutne licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1885">**ReArmResult** – Indicates the result of rearming the installed key which can extend the expiry of the current license</span></span>

### <a name="onenoteenrollmentresult"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1886">OneNote.EnrollmentResult</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1886">OneNote.EnrollmentResult</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1887">Ovaj događaj evidentira status posle prijave na Intune.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1887">This event logs the status upon Intune enrollment.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1888">Ovaj slučaj je specifičan za naloge omogućene za Intune.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1888">This scenario is specific to Intune enabled accounts.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1889">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1889">The following fields are collected:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1890">**EnrollmentResult** - Rezultat prijave na Intune</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1890">**EnrollmentResult** - The result of Intune enrollment</span></span>

## <a name="microsoft-autoupdate-mau-events"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1891">Događaji aplikacije Microsoft AutoUpdate (MAU)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1891">Microsoft AutoUpdate (MAU) events</span></span>

### <a name="appdelegate_launch"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-1892">appdelegate_launch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1892">appdelegate_launch</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1893">Ovaj događaj pokazuje da je došlo do pokušaja pokretanja aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1893">This event denotes that an attempt to launch the app occurred.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1894">Evidentiramo njegov rezultat (otkazivanje ili uspeh).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1894">We log its result (failure or success).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1895">Koristimo ga da bismo identifikovali slučajeve kada MAU ne uspe da se pokrene</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1895">We use this event to identify cases in which MAU fails to launch</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1896">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1896">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1897">**App** – Proces aplikacije koji šalje događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1897">**App** - The application process sending the event</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1898">**AppInfo_Language** – Jezik koji aplikacija koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1898">**AppInfo_Language** - The language the application is running under</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1899">**AppversionLong** – Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1899">**AppversionLong** - The application version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1900">**Channel** – Željene opcije za korisnike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1900">**Channel** - The preference for audience</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1901">**Device_NetworkCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1901">**Device_NetworkCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1902">**DeviceID** – Identifikator uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1902">**DeviceID** - The device identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1903">**DeviceInfo_Model** – Model hardvera uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1903">**DeviceInfo_Model** - The Hardware Model of the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1904">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – Tip mreže (Wi-Fi, žična, nepoznato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1904">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** - The type of network (Wi-Fi, Wired, Unknown)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1905">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1905">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The version of the Operating System</span></span>

 - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1906">**Event_ReceivedTime** – Vreme prijema telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1906">**Event_ReceivedTime** - The time at which telemetry was received</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1907">**EventInfo_Name** – Ime događaja telemetrije koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1907">**EventInfo_Name** - The name of the telemetry event being logged</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1908">**EventInfo_Time** – Vreme dešavanja evidentiranog događaja telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1908">**EventInfo_Time** - The time at which the logged event took place</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1909">**HowTocheck** – Željene opcije za proveru da li postoje ispravke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1909">**HowTocheck** - The preference for checking of updates</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1910">**Payload** – Skup statičkog teksta koji pokazuje status pokretanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1910">**Payload** - A set of static text indicating launch status.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1911">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1911">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1912">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** – Prva 3 okteta IP adrese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1912">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** - The first 3 octets of the IP address</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1913">**SessionId** – Identifikator sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1913">**SessionId** - The identifier for the session</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1915">Ovaj događaj pokazuje da je došlo do skladnog izlaska iz aplikacije.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1915">This event denotes that a graceful Application Exit occurred.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1916">Koristimo ga da bismo razlikovali skladne izlaske iz aplikacije od neskladnih.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1916">We use this event to distinguish Graceful Application Exits from ungraceful ones.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-1917">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1917">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1918">**App** – Proces aplikacije koji šalje događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1918">**App** - The application process sending the event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1919">**AppInfo_Language** – Jezik koji aplikacija koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1919">**AppInfo_Language** - The language the application is running under</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1920">**AppVersionLong** – Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1920">**AppVersionLong** - The application version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1921">**Channel** – Željene opcije za korisnike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1921">**Channel** - The preference for audience</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1922">**Device_NetworkCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1922">**Device_NetworkCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1923">**DeviceID** – Identifikator uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1923">**DeviceID** - The device identifier</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1924">**DeviceInfo_Model** – Model hardvera uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1924">**DeviceInfo_Model** - The Hardware Model of the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1925">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – Tip mreže (Wi-Fi, žična, nepoznato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1925">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** - The type of network (Wifi, Wired, Unknown)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1926">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1926">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The version of the Operating System</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1927">**Event_ReceivedTime** – Vreme prijema telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1927">**Event_ReceivedTime** - The time at which telemetry was received</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1928">**EventInfo_Name** – Ime događaja telemetrije koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1928">**EventInfo_Name** - The name of the telemetry event being logged</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1929">**EventInfo_Time** – Vreme dešavanja evidentiranog događaja telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1929">**EventInfo_Time** - The time at which the logged event took place</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-1930">**HowTocheck** – Željene opcije za proveru da li postoje ispravke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-1930">**HowTocheck** - The preference for checking of updates</span></span>

### <a name="cloningtask_helpertoolconnection"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-2021">cloningtask_helpertoolconnection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-2021">cloningtask_helpertoolconnection</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-2022">Ovaj događaj beleži probleme sa instaliranjem na klonu (to jest, ne uspemo da se povežemo sa pomoćnikom da bismo primenili ažuriranje ili se povežemo, ali pomoćnik ne može da primeni ažuriranje).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-2022">This event records issues with install on clone (i.e. either we fail to connect to the helper to apply an update, or we connect but the helper is unable to apply the update).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-2023">Ako nam se prijavi zapis, to znači da instaliranje na klonu nije uspelo i da mora da se vrati na ažuriranje na licu mesta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-2023">If we ever get a record reported, this means install on clone has failed and will now have to fallback to an in-place update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-2024">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-2024">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-2025">**App** – Proces aplikacije koji šalje događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-2025">**App** - The application process sending the event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-2026">**AppInfo_Language** – Jezik koji aplikacija koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-2026">**AppInfo_Language** - The language the application is running under</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-3025">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-3025">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The Version of the Operating System</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-3029">**HowTocheck** – Željene opcije za proveru da li postoje ispravke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-3029">**HowTocheck** - The preference for checking of updates</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-3030">**Payload** – Sadrži preusmereni URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-3030">**Payload** - Contains redirected URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-3031">To je Microsoft lokacija za preuzimanje kada kanal nije podešen na opciju „Prilagođeno“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-3031">This is Microsoft download location except when the channel is set to Custom.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-3032">Ta vrednost je postavljena na opciju „Prilagođena lokacija“ za prilagođeni kanal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-3032">For Custom channel, this value is set to "Custom Location".</span></span>

### <a name="downloadactor_status"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-3080">downloadactor_status</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-3080">downloadactor_status</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-3081">To evidentira da postoje pokušaji dobavljanja pratećih datoteka i njihove rezultate (uspeh ili otkazivanje).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-3081">This event logs that there are attempts to fetch collateral files and their result (Success or Failure).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-3082">Želimo da znamo koje se pomoćne datoteke i koji se paketi dobavljaju.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-3082">We want to know the collaterals and packages being fetched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-3083">Dobavljanje pogrešne datoteke može da ukazuje na problem sa verzijom/pomoćnom datotekom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-3083">A wrong file being fetched can indicate a build/collateral issue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-3084">Ovaj događaj koristimo da bismo obezbedili da proces ažuriranja funkcioniše na očekivani način i da bismo vam pomogli prilikom rešavanja problema u slučaju grešaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-3084">We use this event for ensuring the update process works as expected and to help troubleshoot errors.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5452">**HowTocheck** – Željene opcije za proveru da li postoje ispravke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5452">**HowTocheck** - The preference for checking of updates</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5453">**Payload** – Sadrži ID zahteva, ime aplikacije, vreme odziva i/ili kôd statusa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5453">**Payload** - Contains request ID, application name, response time and/or status code.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5454">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5454">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5455">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** – Prva 3 okteta IP adrese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5455">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** - The first 3 octets of the IP address</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5456">**SessionId** – Identifikator sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5456">**SessionId** - The identifier for the session</span></span>



### <a name="webservices_webcontent"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-5457">webservices_webcontent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5457">webservices_webcontent</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-5458">Evidentiramo zahteve i odgovore primljene u veb uslugama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5458">We log requests and responses received into webservices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5459">Ovaj događaj koristimo da bismo obezbedili da proces ažuriranja funkcioniše na očekivani način i da bismo vam pomogli prilikom rešavanja problema u slučaju grešaka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5459">We use this event for ensuring the update process works as expected and to help troubleshoot errors.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="62abc-5460">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5460">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5461">**App** – Proces aplikacije koji šalje događaj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5461">**App** - The application process sending the event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5462">**AppInfo_Language** – Jezik koji aplikacija koristi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5462">**AppInfo_Language** - The language the application is running under</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5463">**AppVersionLong** – Verzija aplikacije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5463">**AppVersionLong** - The application Version</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5464">**Channel** – Željene opcije za korisnike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5464">**Channel** - The preference for audience</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5465">**Device_NetworkCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5465">**Device_NetworkCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5466">**DeviceID** – Identifikator uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5466">**DeviceID** - The device identifier</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5467">**DeviceInfo_Model** – Model hardvera uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5467">**DeviceInfo_Model** - The Hardware Model of the device</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5468">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** – Tip mreže (Wi-Fi, žična, nepoznato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5468">**DeviceInfo_NetworkType** - The type of network (Wi-Fi, Wired, Unknown)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5469">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** – Verzija operativnog sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5469">**DeviceInfo_OsBuild** - The Version of the Operating System</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5470">**Event_ReceivedTime** – Vreme prijema telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5470">**Event_ReceivedTime** - The time at which telemetry was received</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5471">**EventInfo_Name** – Ime događaja telemetrije koji se evidentira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5471">**EventInfo_Name** - The name of the telemetry event being logged</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5472">**EventInfo_Time** – Vreme dešavanja evidentiranog događaja telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5472">**EventInfo_Time** - The time at which the logged event took place</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5473">**HowTocheck** – Željene opcije za proveru da li postoje ispravke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5473">**HowTocheck** - The preference for checking of updates</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5474">**Payload** – Sadrži ID pozivaoca veb usluge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5474">**Payload** - Contains web-service caller ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5475">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** – Zemlja u kojoj se nalazi uređaj (na osnovu IP adrese)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5475">**PipelineInfo_ClientCountry** - The device country (based on IP address)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5476">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** – Prva 3 okteta IP adrese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5476">**PipelineInfo_ClientIp** - The first 3 octets of the IP address</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5477">**SessionId** – Identifikator sesije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5477">**SessionId** - The identifier for the session</span></span>

## <a name="onenote-sync-events"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-5478">Događaji sinhronizovanja programa OneNote</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5478">OneNote sync events</span></span>

### <a name="officeonenotestoragenotebooksyncresult"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-5479">Office.OneNote.Storage.NotebookSyncResult</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5479">Office.OneNote.Storage.NotebookSyncResult</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="62abc-5480">Ovaj događaj evidentira rezultat sinhronizacije beležnice.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5480">This event logs notebook sync result.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5481">Koristi se za otkrivanje broja jedinstvenih ciljeva sinhronizacije kada se izračunava rezultat sinhronizacije programa OneNote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5481">It is used for figuring out how many unique sync targets when calculating OneNote sync score.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="62abc-5482">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5482">The following fields are collected</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5483">**CachedError_Code** – Numerički ili alfanumerički kôd koji se koristi za određivanje prirode keširane greške i/ili toga zbog čega je do nje došlo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5483">**CachedError_Code** - a numbered or alphanumeric code used to determine the nature of the cached error, and/or why it occurred</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5484">**CachedError_Description** – Opis keširane greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5484">**CachedError_Description** – a description of the cached error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5485">**CachedError_Tag** – Pokazuje gde se u kodu javlja keširana greška</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5485">**CachedError_Tag** – indicate where in the code throws the cached error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5486">**CachedError_Type** – Tip keširane greške, na primer Win32Error itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5486">**CachedError_Type** – the type of the cached error, e.g. Win32Error, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5487">**ExecutionTime** – Vreme u milisekundama potrebno za kopiranje beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5487">**ExecutionTime** – time in milliseconds taken to replicate the notebook</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5488">**Gosid** – Globalni ID prostora objekta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5488">**Gosid** – global object space ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5489">**IdentityType** – Tip identiteta, na primer Windows Live, Org ID itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5489">**IdentityType** – identity type, e.g. Windows Live, Org ID, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5490">**InitialReplicationInSession** – Pokazuje da li je ova replikacija prva replikacija beležnice posle otvaranja ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5490">**InitialReplicationInSession** – is this replication the first notebook replication after open or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5491">**IsBackgroundSync** – Pokazuje da li je ovo sinhronizacija u pozadini ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5491">**IsBackgroundSync** – is this a background sync or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5492">**IsCachedErrorSuppressed** – Pokazuje da li je keširana greška potisnuta ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5492">**IsCachedErrorSuppressed** – is the cached error suppressed or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5493">**IsCachedErrorUnexpected** – Pokazuje da li je keširana greška neočekivana ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5493">**IsCachedErrorUnexpected** – is the cached error unexpected or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5494">**IsNotebookErrorSuppressed** – Pokazuje da li je greška pri sinhronizaciji na nivou beležnice potisnuta ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5494">**IsNotebookErrorSuppressed** – is the notebook level sync error suppressed or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5495">**IsNotebookErrorUnexpected** – Pokazuje da li je greška pri sinhronizaciji na nivou beležnice neočekivana ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5495">**IsNotebookErrorUnexpected** – is the notebook level sync error unexpected or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5496">**IsSectionErrorSuppressed** – Pokazuje da li je greška pri sinhronizaciji odeljka potisnuta ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5496">**IsSectionErrorSuppressed** – is the section sync error suppressed or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5497">**IsSectionErrorUnexpected** – Pokazuje da li je greška pri sinhronizaciji odeljka neočekivana ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5497">**IsSectionErrorUnexpected** – is the section sync error unexpected or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5498">**IsUsingRealtimeSync** – Pokazuje da li sinhronizovanje beležnice koristi modernu sinhronizaciju sadržaja stranice ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5498">**IsUsingRealtimeSync** – is the notebook sync using modern page content sync or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5499">**LastAttemptedSync** – Vremenska oznaka kada je poslednji put pokušano sinhronizovanje beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5499">**LastAttemptedSync** – timestamp when the notebook was attempted to be synced last time</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5500">**LastBackgroundSync** – Vremenska oznaka kada je poslednji put pokušano sinhronizovanje u pozadini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5500">**LastBackgroundSync** – timestamp when the latest background sync was attempted</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5501">**LastNotebookViewedDate** – Datum kada je beležnica poslednji put prikazana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5501">**LastNotebookViewedDate** – the date when the notebook was last viewed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5502">**LastSuccessfulSync** – Vremenska oznaka kada je beležnica prethodno uspešno sinhronizovana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5502">**LastSuccessfulSync** – timestamp when the notebook successfully synced before</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5503">**NeedToRestartBecauseOfInconsistencies** – Pokazuje da li sinhronizacija mora ponovo da se pokrene zbog nedoslednosti ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5503">**NeedToRestartBecauseOfInconsistencies** – does the sync need to restart because of inconsistencies or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5504">**NotebookErrorCode** – Kôd greške pri sinhronizaciji na nivou beležnice sačuvan u prostoru za grafikon beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5504">**NotebookErrorCode** – notebook level sync error code saved on notebook graph space</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5505">**NotebookId** – ID beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5505">**NotebookId** – notebook ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5506">**NotebookType** – Tip beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5506">**NotebookType** – notebook type</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5507">**ReplicatingAgainBecauseOfInconsistencies** – Pokazuje da li se sinhronizacija ponovo pokreće zbog nedoslednosti ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5507">**ReplicatingAgainBecauseOfInconsistencies** – does the sync restart because of inconsistencies or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5508">**SectionError_Code** – Numerički ili alfanumerički kôd koji se koristi za određivanje prirode greške pri sinhronizaciji odeljka i/ili toga zbog čega je do nje došlo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5508">**SectionError_Code** – a numbered or alphanumeric code used to determine the nature of the section sync error, and/or why it occurred</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5509">**SectionError_Description** – Opis greške pri sinhronizaciji odeljka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5509">**SectionError_Description** – a description of the section sync error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5510">**SectionError_Tag** – Pokazuje gde se u kodu javlja greška pri sinhronizaciji odeljka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5510">**SectionError_Tag** – indicate where in the code throws the section sync error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5511">**SectionError_Type** – Tip greške pri sinhronizaciji odeljka, na primer Win32Error itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5511">**SectionError_Type** – the type of the section sync error, e.g. Win32Error, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5512">**Success** – Pokazuje da li je beležnica uspešno sinhronizovana ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5512">**Success** – is the notebook sync successful or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5513">**SyncDestinationType** – Tip odredišta sinhronizacije, to jest OneDrive ili SharePoint Online</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5513">**SyncDestinationType** – sync destination type, i.e. OneDrive or SharePoint Online</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5514">**SyncId** – Broj jedinstven za svako sinhronizovanje beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5514">**SyncId** – a number unique to each notebook sync</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5515">**SyncWasFirstInSession** – Pokazuje da li je ova sinhronizacija prva sinhronizacija u trenutnoj sesiji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5515">**SyncWasFirstInSession** – is this sync the first sync in current session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5516">**SyncWasUserInitiated** – Pokazuje da li je ovu sinhronizaciju pokrenuo korisnik ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5516">**SyncWasUserInitiated** – is this sync user initiated or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5517">**TenantId** – ID SharePoint zakupca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5517">**TenantId** – SharePoint tenant ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5518">**TimeSinceLastAttemptedSync** – Vreme proteklo od poslednjeg pokušaja sinhronizacije beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5518">**TimeSinceLastAttemptedSync** – time since last notebook sync attempt</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5519">**TimeSinceLastSuccessfulSync** – Vreme proteklo od poslednje uspešne sinhronizacije beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5519">**TimeSinceLastSuccessfulSync** – time since last successful notebook sync</span></span>

### <a name="officeonenotestoragerealtimewebsocketsessioninfo"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-5520">Office.OneNote.Storage.RealTime.WebSocketSessionInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5520">Office.OneNote.Storage.RealTime.WebSocketSessionInfo</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="62abc-5521">Ovaj događaj evidentira rezultat sinhronizovanja veb priključka za obe sinhronizacije programa OneNote: modernu sinhronizaciju sadržaja stranice i modernu sinhronizaciju hijerarhije. Koristi se za otkrivanje broja jedinstvenih ciljeva sinhronizacije kada se izračunava rezultat sinhronizacije programa OneNote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5521">This event logs WebSocket sync result for both OneNote modern page content sync modern hierarchy sync. It is used for figuring out how many unique sync targets when calculating OneNote sync score.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5522">Koristi se i za kontrolnu tablu performansi moderne sinhronizacije programa OneNote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5522">It is also used for OneNote modern sync performance dashboard.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="62abc-5523">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5523">The following fields are collected:</span></span>
 
- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5524">**CloseReason** – Razlog zatvaranja veb priključka, na primer nestandardno zatvaranje itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5524">**CloseReason** - WebSocket close reason, e.g. Abnormal close, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5525">**DataIsFreshCount** – Broj uspešnih zahteva za pregled izmena u sesiji veb priključka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5525">**DataIsFreshCount** - number of successful pull requests in the WebSocket session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5526">**DeviceSessionId** – ID sesije uređaja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5526">**DeviceSessionId** - Device session ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5527">**DownloadCount** – Broj preuzimanja u sesiji veb priključka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5527">**DownloadCount** - number of downloads in the WebSocket session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5528">**Error** – U osnovi predstavlja: Exception_Type + Exception_Description + Exception_Code + Exception_Tag</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5528">**Error** - is basically Exception_Type + Exception_Description + Exception_Code + Exception_Tag</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5529">**Exception_Code** – Numerički ili alfanumerički kôd koji se koristi za određivanje prirode greške i/ili toga zbog čega je do nje došlo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5529">**Exception_Code** - a numbered or alphanumeric code used to determine the nature of an error, and/or why it occurred</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5530">**Exception_Description** – Opis greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5530">**Exception_Description** - a description of the error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5531">**Exception_Tag** – Pokazuje gde se u kodu javlja greška</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5531">**Exception_Tag** - indicate where in the code throws the error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5532">**Exception_Type** – Tip greške, na primer Win32Error itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5532">**Exception_Type** - the type of the error, e.g. Win32Error, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5533">**FirstUpdateSize** – Dužina poruke o prvom ažuriranju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5533">**FirstUpdateSize** - first update message length</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5534">**HasError** – Pokazuje da li postoji greška tokom sesije veb priključka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5534">**HasError** - whether there is an error during the WebSocket session</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5535">**IsEducationNotebook** – Pokazuje da li je trenutna beležnica obrazovna beležnica ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5535">**IsEducationNotebook** - Is the current notebook education notebook or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5536">**IsHierarchyResource** – Pokazuje da li je trenutni resurs stranica ili odeljak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5536">**IsHierarchyResource** - Is the current resource a page or a section</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5537">**NotebookId** – ID OneNote beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5537">**NotebookId** - OneNote notebook ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5538">**OperationWithError** – Pokazuje u kojoj operaciji je došlo do greške, na primer WebSocket.Close, WebSocket.Open itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5538">**OperationWithError** - in which operation did the error happen, e.g. WebSocket.Close, WebSocket.Open, etc.</span></span>
