### <a name="officeonenotestoragesectionsyncresult"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-5547">Office.OneNote.Storage.SectionSyncResult</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5547">Office.OneNote.Storage.SectionSyncResult</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="62abc-5548">Ovaj događaj evidentira rezultat sinhronizovanja odeljka.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5548">This event logs section sync result.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5549">Koristi se za otkrivanje broja jedinstvenih ciljeva sinhronizacije kada se izračunava rezultat sinhronizacije programa OneNote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5549">It is used for figuring out how many unique sync targets when calculating OneNote sync score.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5550">Koristi se i za kontrolnu tablu performansi moderne sinhronizacije programa OneNote.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5550">It is also used for OneNote modern sync performance dashboard.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="62abc-5551">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5551">The following fields are collected</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5552">**Error_Code** – Numerički ili alfanumerički kôd koji se koristi za određivanje prirode greške i/ili toga zbog čega je do nje došlo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5552">**Error_Code** - a numbered or alphanumeric code used to determine the nature of an error, and/or why it occurred</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5553">**Error_Description** – Opis greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5553">**Error_Description** - a description of the error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5554">**Error_Tag** – Pokazuje gde se u kodu javlja greška</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5554">**Error_Tag** - indicate where in the code throws the error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5555">**Error_Type** – Tip greške, na primer Win32Error itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5555">**Error_Type** - the type of the error, e.g. Win32Error, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5556">**ErrorLast** – Kôd greške poslednje viđene greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5556">**ErrorLast** - the error code of last seen error</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5557">**ExecutionTime** – Vreme u milisekundama potrebno za kopiranje odeljka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5557">**ExecutionTime** - time in milliseconds taken to replicate the section</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5558">**InitialReplicationInSession** – Pokazuje da li je ova replikacija prva replikacija beležnice posle otvaranja ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5558">**InitialReplicationInSession** - is this replication the first notebook replication after open or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5559">**IsAttachedViaShortcut** – Pokazuje da li je odeljak priložen putem prečice ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5559">**IsAttachedViaShortcut** - is the section attached via shortcut or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5560">**IsBackgroundSync** – Pokazuje da li je ovo sinhronizacija u pozadini ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5560">**IsBackgroundSync** - is this a background sync or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5561">**IsEncrypted** – Pokazuje da li je odeljak šifrovan ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5561">**IsEncrypted** - is the section encrypted or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5562">**IsErrorSuppressed** – Pokazuje da li je ova greška potisnuta ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5562">**IsErrorSuppressed** - is this error suppressed or not</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5563">**IsErrorTransient** – Pokazuje da li je ova greška privremena ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5563">**IsErrorTransient** - is this error transient or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5564">**IsErrorUnexpected** – Pokazuje da li je ova greška neočekivana ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5564">**IsErrorUnexpected** - is this error unexpected or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5565">**IsUsingRealtimeSync** – Pokazuje da li sinhronizovanje odeljka koristi modernu sinhronizaciju sadržaja stranice ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5565">**IsUsingRealtimeSync** - is the section sync using modern page content sync or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5566">**NotebookId** – ID beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5566">**NotebookId** - notebook ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5567">**NotebookPath** - PII čišćenje URL adrese beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5567">**NotebookPath** - PII scrubbed notebook URL</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5568">**SectionPath** - PII čišćenje URL adrese odeljka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5568">**SectionPath** - PII scrubbed section URL</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5569">**SectionReplicatingIsOutbound** – Pokazuje da li je ova replikacija odlazna ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5569">**SectionReplicatingIsOutbound** - is this replication an outbound replication or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5570">**SectionReplicatingIsSameIdentity** – Pokazuje da li je ova replikacija zasnovana na istom identitetu datoteke ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5570">**SectionReplicatingIsSameIdentity** - is this replication based on the same file identity or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5571">**SectionResourceId** – ID resursa OneNote odeljka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5571">**SectionResourceId** - OneNote section resource ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5572">**Success** – Pokazuje da li je odeljak uspešno sinhronizovan ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5572">**Success** - is the section sync successful or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5573">**SyncDestinationType** – Tip odredišta sinhronizacije, to jest OneDrive ili SharePoint Online</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5573">**SyncDestinationType** - sync destination type, i.e. OneDrive or SharePoint Online</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5574">**SyncId** – Broj jedinstven za svaku sinhronizaciju odeljka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5574">**SyncId** - a number unique to each section sync</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5575">**SyncWasFirstInSession** – Pokazuje da li je ova sinhronizacija prva sinhronizacija u trenutnoj sesiji</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5575">**SyncWasFirstInSession** - is this sync the first sync in current session</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5576">**SyncWasUserInitiated** – Pokazuje da li je ovu sinhronizaciju pokrenuo korisnik ili nije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5576">**SyncWasUserInitiated** - is this sync user initiated or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5577">**TenantId** – ID SharePoint zakupca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5577">**TenantId** - SharePoint tenant ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5578">**UnmappedGosid** – ID odeljka pre nego što se primeni GUID za mapiranje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5578">**UnmappedGosid** - section ID before applying the mapping GUID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5585">**Context** – Identifikator koji kategorizuje to što korisnik pokušava da uradi, na primer preimenovanje odeljka, ponovno otvaranje beležnice itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5585">**Context** - an enum categorizes what user is trying to do, e.g. rename a section, reopen a notebook, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5587">**Error_Description** – Opis greške</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5587">**Error_Description** - a description of the error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5588">**Error_Tag** – Pokazuje gde se u kodu javlja greška</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5588">**Error_Tag** - indicate where in the code throws the error</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5589">**Error_Type** – Tip greške, na primer Win32Error itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5589">**Error_Type** - the type of the error, e.g. Win32Error, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5590">**ErrorText** – Tekst greške prikazan u korisničkom interfejsu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5590">**ErrorText** - error text shown in the UI</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5591">**Explanation** – Objašnjava koje je odlazne promene na čekanju potrebno premestiti u odeljke na pogrešnom mestu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5591">**Explanation** - explains what kind of pending outbound changes that need to be moved to misplaced sections</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5592">**fishbowlType** – Vrsta akvarijuma, na primer akvarijum stranice, akvarijum odeljka itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5592">**fishbowlType** - type of fishbowl, e.g. page fishbowl, section fishbowl, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5593">**IDS** – Identifikator vrednosti celog broja za tekst prikazan u korisničkom interfejsu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5593">**IDS** - an integer identifier for the text shown in the UI</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5594">**idsFishbowl** – Identifikator vrednosti celog broja za grešku akvarijuma prikazanu u korisničkom interfejsu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5594">**idsFishbowl** - an integer identifier for the fishbowl error shown in the UI</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5595">**IsUsingRealtimeHierarchySync** – Pokazuje da li se koristi moderna sinhronizacija hijerarhije ili ne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5595">**IsUsingRealtimeHierarchySync** - Is using modern hierarchy sync or not</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5596">**NotebookId** – ID beležnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5596">**NotebookId** - notebook id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5597">**PageSyncUIState** – Niska statusa sinhronizovanja stranice, na primer UpToDate, Syncing, SaveOffline, SyncError itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5597">**PageSyncUIState** - page sync status string, e.g., UpToDate, Syncing, SaveOffline, SyncError, etc.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5599">**Source** – Identifikator koji pokazuje koji je događaj pokrenuo korisnički interfejs, to jest napravio novu Redx sliku, grešku pri sinhronizovanju u korisničkom interfejsu sinhronizacije, prikazani dijalog greške itd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5599">**Source** - an enum indicates which event triggered the UI, i.e. created a new redx image, sync error in the sync UI, error dialog displayed, etc.</span></span>

### <a name="office_firstrun_apple_telemetryoptin"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-5620">Office_FirstRun_Apple_TelemetryOptIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5620">Office_FirstRun_Apple_TelemetryOptIn</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-5621">Ovaj događaj se sakuplja za Office aplikacije koje se pokreću u okviru Apple platformi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5621">This event is collected for Office applications running under Apple platforms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5622">Događaj se koristi za nadgledanje zdravstvenog stanja našeg protoka telemetrije kod davanja saglasnosti za pokretanje prvog utiska.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5622">The event is used to monitor the health of our telemetry opt-in flow in First Run Experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-5623">Prikupljamo kôd koji označava koji tip opcije prikupljanja dijagnostičkih podataka je izabrao korisnik.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-5623">We collect a code that denotes what type of diagnostic data collection option was selected by the user.</span></span>

### <a name="officesystemsystemhealthungracefulapplicationexitwin32"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-6072">Office.System.SystemHealthUngracefulApplicationExitWin32</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-6072">Office.System.SystemHealthUngracefulApplicationExitWin32</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-6073">Događaj pokreće neočekivani prekid aplikacije (na primer, uklanjanje u upravljaču zadacima, prekid aplikacije, itd.) za Office klijentske aplikacije kao što su, ali ne ograničavajući se na, Word, Excel, PowerPoint i Outlook.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-6073">The event is triggers by an abnormal application termination (for example, task manager kill, application hang, etc.) for Office client applications such as, but not limited to, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-6074">Metrike neočekivanog izlaska iz aplikacija koristimo za merenje ispravnosti proizvoda klijenata sistema Office.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-6074">We use Ungraceful Application Exit metrics to measure the health of Office client products.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="62abc-6075">To je signal, ključan za posao, koji koriste Office inženjeri da bi postigli stabilnost proizvoda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-6075">It is a business-critical signal used by Office engineers to infer product stability.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-6078">**CrashedAppMajor -** Identifikator glavne verzije ugroženog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-6078">**CrashedAppMajor -** Major version identifier for the affected process.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-6080">**CrashedAppRevision -** Identifikator izdanja verzije ugroženog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-6080">**CrashedAppRevision -** Build version identifier for the affected process.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-6081">**CrashedEcsETag -** Identifikator eksperimenta palog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-6081">**CrashedEcsETag -** An experiment identifier for the crashed process.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-6082">**CrashedModuleName -** Ime neispravnog modula.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-6082">**CrashedModuleName -** Failing module name.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-6083">**CrashedSessionId -** Jedinstveni identifikator palog procesa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-6083">**CrashedSessionId -** A unique identifier of the crashed process.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-6084">**CrashedSessionInitTime -** Vreme kada je počeo ugroženi proces.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-6084">**CrashedSessionInitTime -** The time when the affected process started.</span></span>

### <a name="officetelemetryvolumetrackingdata"></a><span data-ttu-id="62abc-6419">Office.Telemetry.VolumeTrackingData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-6419">Office.Telemetry.VolumeTrackingData</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-6420">Događaj količinskog praćenja metrike za događaj telemetrije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-6420">Event volume tracking metrics for telemetry events</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62abc-6421">Prikupljaju se sledeća polja:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-6421">The following fields are collected:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-6422">**EventThreshold** - Maksimalan broj instanci jednog događaja koje mogu biti poslate u vremenskom okviru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-6422">**EventThreshold** - The maximum number of instances of a single event that can be sent in a window of time.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-6423">**HighestEventCount** - Najveći broj instanci jednog događaja koje su poslate u vremenskom okviru</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-6423">**HighestEventCount** - The highest number of instances of a single event sent this window.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-6424">**HighestEventName** - Ime događaja sa najvećim brojem instanci u vremenskom okviru.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-6424">**HighestEventName** - The name of the event with the highest number of instances in this window.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-6425">**TimeWindowInSeconds** - Trajanje vremenskog okvira u sekundama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-6425">**TimeWindowInSeconds** - The duration of the window in seconds.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-6426">**TotalEvents** - Ukupan broj događaja koji su poslati tokom vremenskog okvira.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-6426">**TotalEvents** - The total number of events sent during the window.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="62abc-6427">**UniqueEvents** - Broj jedinstvenih događaja koji su poslati tokom vremenskog okvira.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62abc-6427">**UniqueEvents** - The number of unique events sent during a window.</span></span>
